MESSAGE.JP: 上。
MESSAGE.EN: The rooftop.
MESSAGE.Translation: The rooftop.

MESSAGE.JP: は黒猫姿の笹瀬川さんと、ふたりで、ここに来ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I came up here along with Sasasegawa-san, who was obviously a cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: I came up here along with Sasasegawa-san, who was obviously a cat.

MESSAGE.JP: れの日には、日差しが暖かくて、風が気持ちいい場所。
MESSAGE.EN: On sunny days, you could bask in the warm sun while the breeze kept you cool.
MESSAGE.Translation: On sunny days, you could bask in the warm sun while the breeze kept you cool.

MESSAGE.JP: れど、なにか、今の風は、どこか無機質で…。
MESSAGE.EN: However, the current breeze felt somewhat inorganic, and it was...
MESSAGE.Translation: However, the current breeze felt somewhat inorganic, and it was...

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…静かですわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...Quiet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...Quiet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh-huh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh-huh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: の静かさに、薄ら寒ささえ感じる場所だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was so quiet here that it actually felt chilly.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was so quiet here that it actually felt chilly.

MESSAGE.JP: れから、探し回って。
MESSAGE.EN: We had searched all over for people since we left my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: We had searched all over for people since we left my room.

MESSAGE.JP: 学校中探し回って、誰とも会うことはなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But we hadn't run into a single person.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But we hadn't run into a single person.

MESSAGE.JP: 、テレビで見た歌の映像で、同じような感覚を覚えたことがある。
MESSAGE.EN: That reminded me of how I felt after seeing a music video on TV when I was a kid..
MESSAGE.Translation: That reminded me of how I felt after seeing a music video on TV when I was a kid..

MESSAGE.JP: 愛いはずのパペットたちの映像。
MESSAGE.EN: There were adorable puppets in it.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were adorable puppets in it.

MESSAGE.JP: れど、その歌の主人公は、最後は絵の中に閉じ込められてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: However, they trapped the boy, the main character of the video, in a picture book at the end.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, they trapped the boy, the main character of the video, in a picture book at the end.

MESSAGE.JP: 愛の無い歌のはずなんだけれど。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though the song was supposed to just be silly,
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though the song was supposed to just be silly,

MESSAGE.JP: れが妙に、薄ら寒かった。
MESSAGE.EN: I found it mysteriously chilling.
MESSAGE.Translation: I found it mysteriously chilling.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「この世界、いつまでいられるのかしら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝How much longer will we be able to stay in this world...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝How much longer will we be able to stay in this world...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「わからないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't know, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't know, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もうこれ以上、小さくなることってあるのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wonder if it can possibly get any smaller than it already is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wonder if it can possibly get any smaller than it already is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ないなら、この世界は多分まだしばらくは在り続けると思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If not, I think it'll still last a little while longer at this size.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If not, I think it'll still last a little while longer at this size.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「どこにいるんでしょうね、元凶は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Which means we still need to find the culprit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Which means we still need to find the culprit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「マスター、ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The master.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The master.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんは、相変わらずこの世界のマスターにネガティブな印象を持ち続けてるみたいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Her choice of words told me that she still held a negative impression of the one behind all of this.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her choice of words told me that she still held a negative impression of the one behind all of this.

MESSAGE.JP: れはしょうがないことだとは思うんだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: That was understandable...
MESSAGE.Translation: That was understandable...

MESSAGE.JP: は、この世界を作った意味を知りたいし、それを全うさせて終わらせるべきだと思っている。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet I wanted to know why this world had been created, and believed that it would come to an end should we fulfill its purpose.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet I wanted to know why this world had been created, and believed that it would come to an end should we fulfill its purpose.

MESSAGE.JP: 介の言葉を思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I recalled Kyousuke's words.
MESSAGE.Translation: I recalled Kyousuke's words.

MESSAGE.JP: きっと、ネガティブなものなんかじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I was sure there was nothing malicious about this world.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I was sure there was nothing malicious about this world.

MESSAGE.JP: 介がそうしてほしいって言うなら、きっとそうなんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I was certain that was the case since Kyousuke wanted me to fulfill the world's purpose.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was certain that was the case since Kyousuke wanted me to fulfill the world's purpose.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どこにいるのか、かぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Problem is, we don't know where the master is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Problem is, we don't know where the master is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 分もう、この世界には僕らしかいない。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed like we were the only ones in here.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like we were the only ones in here.

MESSAGE.JP: こかに隠れてる、『マスター』をのぞいて。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, the two of us and and the 'master,' who was hiding somewhere.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, the two of us and and the 'master,' who was hiding somewhere.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「これだけ破綻してても、ルールはまだ守られてるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even though the world had been reduced to this, the rules still seem to be in effect.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even though the world had been reduced to this, the rules still seem to be in effect.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だから、きっと見つけられるはずだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So I'm sure we should still be able to find its master.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So I'm sure we should still be able to find its master.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「それもルールなんですの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Is that part of the rules?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Is that part of the rules?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I reckon so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I reckon so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「願いを叶えたいなら、本当は妨害する必要なんてないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Because in order to make their wish come true, they really don't need to interfere.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Because in order to make their wish come true, they really don't need to interfere.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何か意味があるか、やむを得ずそうなってるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝They're doing this because there's a good reason for it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝They're doing this because there's a good reason for it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…そうせざるを得なくて、僕らはここで悩んでいるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...And because of that good reason, we are here agonizing over it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...And because of that good reason, we are here agonizing over it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: スターを見つけなきゃ、願いなんてわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: Identifying the master would surely help us figure out what their wish was.
MESSAGE.Translation: Identifying the master would surely help us figure out what their wish was.

MESSAGE.JP: うしたら、マスターなら願いを叶える為に、僕たちと会わなきゃいけないはずなんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Thus we needed to meet with the master to make their wish come true.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thus we needed to meet with the master to make their wish come true.

MESSAGE.JP: とえマスターに僕たちと会うような細工が出来ないとしても。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if they weren't allowed to use any shortcuts to make it happen,
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if they weren't allowed to use any shortcuts to make it happen,

MESSAGE.JP: れでもきっと、会えるようにはなってるはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: we should be able to eventually meet each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: we should be able to eventually meet each other.

MESSAGE.JP: 率がゼロなら…それこそ、この世界に意味なんてない。
MESSAGE.EN: If the chances were zero... that would really mean that this world was aimless and meaningless.
MESSAGE.Translation: If the chances were zero... that would really mean that this world was aimless and meaningless.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「つまり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝To put it another way,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝To put it another way,❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕らは、まだ探さなきゃいけないってことかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝we're still supposed to keep searching for them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝we're still supposed to keep searching for them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…そうですわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...I agree.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...I agree.❞

MESSAGE.JP: して、僕らは学校中を歩いて回った。
MESSAGE.EN: Thus we wandered all around the school.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thus we wandered all around the school.

MESSAGE.JP: ることが出来ない教室。
MESSAGE.EN: Past classrooms that wouldn't let us in.
MESSAGE.Translation: Past classrooms that wouldn't let us in.

MESSAGE.JP: かない扉。
MESSAGE.EN: Doors that wouldn't open.
MESSAGE.Translation: Doors that wouldn't open.

MESSAGE.JP: りぼてみたいな世界。
MESSAGE.EN: The world now looked like it was made of papier mache.
MESSAGE.Translation: The world now looked like it was made of papier mache.

MESSAGE.JP: もいない世界を、当てもなく探して回る。
MESSAGE.EN: We kept wandering around aimlessly.
MESSAGE.Translation: We kept wandering around aimlessly.

MESSAGE.JP: も動かない世界なのに、時間だけは過ぎていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Nothing in the world changed, yet time kept ticking by.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nothing in the world changed, yet time kept ticking by.

MESSAGE.JP: 腹は空くし、眠くもなる。
MESSAGE.EN: We eventually got hungry and sleepy.
MESSAGE.Translation: We eventually got hungry and sleepy.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「非常食っていうのは、大事ですわね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I now understand the importance of emergency rations...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I now understand the importance of emergency rations...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So do I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So do I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: るー、とキャベツ入りカップめんをすする。
MESSAGE.EN: We were slurping on cup noodles with cabbage.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were slurping on cup noodles with cabbage.

MESSAGE.JP: ャベツはカップめんだけじゃあまりにも栄養が偏るから、せめてと入れたものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The cabbage was added to make up for the lack of nutrition, if only a little.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cabbage was added to make up for the lack of nutrition, if only a little.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「真人に感謝しなきゃね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We must thank Masato for these.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We must thank Masato for these.❞

MESSAGE.JP: やつ代わりに、と買いだめて置いたんだろう。カップめんがなくなっても、まだ袋のインスタントめんはいっぱいあった。
MESSAGE.EN: He must have stored these as snacks, as there were still a bunch of other instant noodles left.
MESSAGE.Translation: He must have stored these as snacks, as there were still a bunch of other instant noodles left.

MESSAGE.JP: 菜は学食の冷蔵庫にいくらかあったけど、もうお米は手に入れられそうもなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: And there were some vegetables left in the cafeteria refrigerator, although we had to give up on the rice.
MESSAGE.Translation: And there were some vegetables left in the cafeteria refrigerator, although we had to give up on the rice.

MESSAGE.JP: 米を入れている場所の鍵がないからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The rice cabinet was locked tight, and we didn't have the key.
MESSAGE.Translation: The rice cabinet was locked tight, and we didn't have the key.

MESSAGE.JP: れまでは、おばちゃんが出してたのをもらってたんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: When the cafeteria staff were still around, they had provided it to us.
MESSAGE.Translation: When the cafeteria staff were still around, they had provided it to us.

MESSAGE.JP: の調子じゃ、真人のカップめんはどんどん減っていってしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Before long, Masato's stock of noodles would run out.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before long, Masato's stock of noodles would run out.

MESSAGE.JP: どうしようもなくなったら、鍵を壊さないとダメかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...So we might have to break the lock when we run out of food.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...So we might have to break the lock when we run out of food.

MESSAGE.JP: うだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Come to think of it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Come to think of it.

MESSAGE.JP: の部屋にあるカップめんは、無くなっていくんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: We were running out of the cup noodles in this room.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were running out of the cup noodles in this room.

MESSAGE.JP: 菜は、学食に誰もいなくても、そこにあるのに。
MESSAGE.EN: However, the vegetables in the cafeteria seemed to get restocked despite there being no staff members.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, the vegetables in the cafeteria seemed to get restocked despite there being no staff members.

MESSAGE.JP: の部屋だけは、他と違う。
MESSAGE.EN: Only this room was different from all other places.
MESSAGE.Translation: Only this room was different from all other places.

MESSAGE.JP: まさら気づいたことだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a little too late for me to realize this, but...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a little too late for me to realize this, but...

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんはここでだけ元に戻れて、カップめんは減っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: This was also the only place where Sasasegawa-san could change back into a human.
MESSAGE.Translation: This was also the only place where Sasasegawa-san could change back into a human.

MESSAGE.JP: こだけ世界の中じゃルールの適用外だった。
MESSAGE.EN: This room was the only spot in this world in which the rules weren't applied.
MESSAGE.Translation: This room was the only spot in this world in which the rules weren't applied.

MESSAGE.JP: なくとも、これまで探した中じゃ、他にこんな場所はなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: At least, we hadn't found any other place like it yet.
MESSAGE.Translation: At least, we hadn't found any other place like it yet.

MESSAGE.JP: の行けなかった校舎裏でも、笹瀬川さんは猫のままだったし。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasasegawa-san even remained a cat when we made it behind the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san even remained a cat when we made it behind the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（まだまだ、気づくことだらけだなぁ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(There still seem to be many things I've yet to realize...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(There still seem to be many things I've yet to realize...)

MESSAGE.JP: も、どれだけの要素が『マスター』につながってるんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: But I wondered how many of those unknown were connected to the ❛master.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: But I wondered how many of those unknown were connected to the ❛master.❜

MESSAGE.JP: にかひとつでも、もっと明確なきっかけがあればいいんだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: It would have been quite helpful to find something more concrete...
MESSAGE.Translation: It would have been quite helpful to find something more concrete...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（もう、そんなこと言ってられる場合じゃないんだろうけど）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(I guess this isn't the time for me to think about it yet, though.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(I guess this isn't the time for me to think about it yet, though.)

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…笹瀬川さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Sasasegawa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Sasasegawa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とまず、そのことを笹瀬川さんに話してみることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to tell her everything I just came up with.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to tell her everything I just came up with.

MESSAGE.JP: けど、ふたりで色々話してみても、結局何一つ進展はなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...However, even after sharing all of it with her, we weren't able to make any more progress.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...However, even after sharing all of it with her, we weren't able to make any more progress.

MESSAGE.JP: 局今日も、寝ることにする。
MESSAGE.EN: And we ended up going to bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: And we ended up going to bed.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「じゃ、お休みなさいませ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Okay, good night...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Okay, good night...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、おやすみ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: について、目を閉じる。
MESSAGE.EN: I got in bed and closed my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got in bed and closed my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さん、眠れるのかな。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Will she be able to sleep, I wondered.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Will she be able to sleep, I wondered.

MESSAGE.JP: 日はちょっと、いろいろなことがありすぎたし…。
MESSAGE.EN: Too many things happened today...
MESSAGE.Translation: Too many things happened today...

MESSAGE.JP: は考え事をしてると、あんまり眠れないほうだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: I usually had a hard time falling asleep when I had something on my mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: I usually had a hard time falling asleep when I had something on my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: れでも、前に比べたら、ずっとよく眠れるようにはなってる。
MESSAGE.EN: Even so, I didn't have as much trouble with it now as I'd had before.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even so, I didn't have as much trouble with it now as I'd had before.

MESSAGE.JP: ういえば、恭介は言っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was reminded of what Kyousuke had said.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was reminded of what Kyousuke had said.

MESSAGE.JP: の世界は誰かが見ている夢みたいなもの。
MESSAGE.EN: The world was like a dream somebody was having.
MESSAGE.Translation: The world was like a dream somebody was having.

MESSAGE.JP: しここが夢だとしたら。
MESSAGE.EN: If this world really were a dream,
MESSAGE.Translation: If this world really were a dream,

MESSAGE.JP: その中でさらに夢を見るなんて、おかしな話だと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: it would be kinda weird for the people inside to have dreams as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: it would be kinda weird for the people inside to have dreams as well.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（あれ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Hang on a second...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Hang on a second...)

MESSAGE.JP: は、夢を見てただろうか…？
MESSAGE.EN: Had I been having dreams...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Had I been having dreams...?

MESSAGE.JP: そうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Yeah, I had been.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Yeah, I had been.

MESSAGE.JP: は、誰かの夢を見ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd been seeing somebody else's dreams the last few days.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd been seeing somebody else's dreams the last few days.

MESSAGE.JP: 毎、その夢を、ひとつずつ。
MESSAGE.EN: Every night, part by part.
MESSAGE.Translation: Every night, part by part.

MESSAGE.JP: には覚えのないこと。
MESSAGE.EN: In real life, I had experienced none of the things that had happened in the dreams.
MESSAGE.Translation: In real life, I had experienced none of the things that had happened in the dreams.

MESSAGE.JP: 憶にはない。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no memories like those.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no memories like those.

MESSAGE.JP: の記憶にはない、誰かの記憶。
MESSAGE.EN: They belonged to someone else.
MESSAGE.Translation: They belonged to someone else.

MESSAGE.JP: れど、僕自身も感じたことがある情景。
MESSAGE.EN: However, there was just one thing I found similar.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, there was just one thing I found similar.

MESSAGE.JP: れは…。
MESSAGE.EN: And it was...
MESSAGE.Translation: And it was...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…どうして、気づかなかったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Why didn't I realize it sooner?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Why didn't I realize it sooner?❞

MESSAGE.JP: づかなければ、気づかない。
MESSAGE.EN: You don't realize something until you realize it.
MESSAGE.Translation: You don't realize something until you realize it.

MESSAGE.JP: だって、同じだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The same goes for dreams.
MESSAGE.Translation: The same goes for dreams.

MESSAGE.JP: まり、僕の見ていた夢は…。
MESSAGE.EN: In other words, the dreams I was seeing were...
MESSAGE.Translation: In other words, the dreams I was seeing were...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ここ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れるだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Could I make it in?
MESSAGE.Translation: Could I make it in?

MESSAGE.JP: ここにいる』。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛I am here.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛I am here.❜

MESSAGE.JP: れはたった一言で、全ての答えだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Those three words had been the answer to all the questions I had.
MESSAGE.Translation: Those three words had been the answer to all the questions I had.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「入れた…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I made it in...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I made it in...❞

MESSAGE.JP: は確信する。
MESSAGE.EN: I was certain that...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was certain that...

MESSAGE.JP: こが答えだ。
MESSAGE.EN: this place held the answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: this place held the answer.

MESSAGE.JP: して。
MESSAGE.EN: And then,
MESSAGE.Translation: And then,

MESSAGE.JP: 今ここで、僕の目の前にいるものが。
MESSAGE.EN: the one right in front me was...
MESSAGE.Translation: the one right in front me was...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…君が、『マスター』だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...So you are the ❛master.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...So you are the ❛master.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 棄物の小さな山の上。
MESSAGE.EN: On the top of a small mountain of garbage,
MESSAGE.Translation: On the top of a small mountain of garbage,

MESSAGE.JP: の闇に溶け込みそうな体の『マスター』は。
MESSAGE.EN: the ❛master,❜ black enough to blend into the dark of night,
MESSAGE.Translation: the ❛master,❜ black enough to blend into the dark of night,

MESSAGE.JP: 色い瞳を光らせて、こちらを向いた。
MESSAGE.EN: gazed at me with its yellow eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: gazed at me with its yellow eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: れは、黒猫。
MESSAGE.EN: It was that black cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was that black cat.

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんが『変わってしまっていた、あの黒猫』だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was ❛the black cat that Sasasegawa-san has turned into.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: It was ❛the black cat that Sasasegawa-san has turned into.❜

MESSAGE.JP: う、僕ら以外誰もいない世界。そこに唯一残っていた『僕ら以外』。
MESSAGE.EN: There's nobody other than me and her left in this world anymore. However, there was one other thing here with us.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's nobody other than me and her left in this world anymore. However, there was one other thing here with us.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…まさか、黒猫がこの世界を創ってたなんて、思わなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Who would've thought a cat could create a world?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Who would've thought a cat could create a world?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 静に考えたら、他にいないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Had I thought about it calmly, this would have been the only reasonable answer I could have come up with.
MESSAGE.Translation: Had I thought about it calmly, this would have been the only reasonable answer I could have come up with.

MESSAGE.JP: って、僕と笹瀬川さんの他、ここにいたのは。
MESSAGE.EN: Because the only ones left here were me, Sasasegawa-san,
MESSAGE.Translation: Because the only ones left here were me, Sasasegawa-san,

MESSAGE.JP: この猫だけなんだから。
MESSAGE.EN: ...and this cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...and this cat.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それと、夢の内容を思い出したんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I remembered what happened in the dreams I'd been seeing the past few nights.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I remembered what happened in the dreams I'd been seeing the past few nights.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それは、君が見せていたものだったんじゃない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm guessing you're the one who made me see them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm guessing you're the one who made me see them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…君が、どんな風に生きてきたのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You showed me how you've been living your life until now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You showed me how you've been living your life until now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「夢は、君そのものだった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The dreams were about your experiences.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The dreams were about your experiences.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Isn't that right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Isn't that right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 猫は首を傾げる。
MESSAGE.EN: The black cat cocked its head to the side.
MESSAGE.Translation: The black cat cocked its head to the side.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…言葉、通じないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Looks like you can't speak.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Looks like you can't speak.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んでもありの世界でも、それは動かないみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Even in this anything-goes world, it still seemed to be impossible for an actual cat to speak.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even in this anything-goes world, it still seemed to be impossible for an actual cat to speak.

MESSAGE.JP: 日のこの場所でのことだって、言葉で伝えられたらそれで済んだはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: If it was possible, the cat would already have used words to lead me to this place.
MESSAGE.Translation: If it was possible, the cat would already have used words to lead me to this place.

MESSAGE.JP: んな、断片的なイメージだけで伝えてきたのは。
MESSAGE.EN: It had to show me such a fragmented image because...
MESSAGE.Translation: It had to show me such a fragmented image because...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…それしか、出来なかったんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...That was the only thing you could do, wasn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...That was the only thing you could do, wasn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 猫は答えず、ひとつ鳴き声をあげると。
MESSAGE.EN: The black cat let out a cry,
MESSAGE.Translation: The black cat let out a cry,

MESSAGE.JP: の前へ、歩み寄ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: walked up to me,
MESSAGE.Translation: walked up to me,

MESSAGE.JP: ち止まり、顔を上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: stopped at my feet, and looked up at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: stopped at my feet, and looked up at me.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕と、視線を合わせる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Its eyes met mine.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Its eyes met mine.

MESSAGE.JP: して僕は、まぶたを閉じた。
MESSAGE.EN: And I closed my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I closed my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 日のこの場所と、同じような感覚。
MESSAGE.EN: I began feeling the same thing I had yesterday.
MESSAGE.Translation: I began feeling the same thing I had yesterday.

MESSAGE.JP: の中に直接、何かが流れ込んでくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Things started pouring directly into my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Things started pouring directly into my head.

MESSAGE.JP: だ、昨日みたいな断片じゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: The difference was that, this time, they weren't fragments.
MESSAGE.Translation: The difference was that, this time, they weren't fragments.

MESSAGE.JP: 言では表せない、漠然として、膨大なもの。
MESSAGE.EN: The concepts were so undefined and massive that I couldn't describe them with a single word.
MESSAGE.Translation: The concepts were so undefined and massive that I couldn't describe them with a single word.

MESSAGE.JP: はその中に、溺れて沈んでいくようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was as if I was sinking into them, drowning.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was as if I was sinking into them, drowning.

MESSAGE.JP: 分が自分じゃなくなっていくような。
MESSAGE.EN: It was as if I was turning into somebody else.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was as if I was turning into somebody else.

MESSAGE.JP: の感覚に、抵抗する。
MESSAGE.EN: I fought back the sensation.
MESSAGE.Translation: I fought back the sensation.

MESSAGE.JP: 波は、簡単に引いていく。
MESSAGE.EN: ...And I was easily able to push back the wave.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And I was easily able to push back the wave.

MESSAGE.JP: 度は逆に、僕がその波を包み込んでしまいそうになる。
MESSAGE.EN: This time I was beginning to wrap the wave around myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: This time I was beginning to wrap the wave around myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（…ああ）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...Ah.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...Ah.)

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんが感じていたものって、これなのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: I think this might have been what Sasasegawa-san had been feeling.
MESSAGE.Translation: I think this might have been what Sasasegawa-san had been feeling.

MESSAGE.JP: うすることでしか伝えられないから、黒猫は笹瀬川さんにこうやって伝えようとしたんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: No, it must have been, since this seemed to be the only way the cat could communicate with us.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, it must have been, since this seemed to be the only way the cat could communicate with us.

MESSAGE.JP: の世界は夢だ。
MESSAGE.EN: This world is a dream.
MESSAGE.Translation: This world is a dream.

MESSAGE.JP: は、イメージだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Dreams are made of images.
MESSAGE.Translation: Dreams are made of images.

MESSAGE.JP: いうことは、僕ら自身も、ここにいる全てはイメージだということ。
MESSAGE.EN: Which means that everything in here was an image, including ourselves.
MESSAGE.Translation: Which means that everything in here was an image, including ourselves.

MESSAGE.JP: メージを同化する事で、自分と相手の記憶を共有する。
MESSAGE.EN: By synchronizing those images, it seemed possible to share one's memories with another.
MESSAGE.Translation: By synchronizing those images, it seemed possible to share one's memories with another.

MESSAGE.JP: じものになれば、きっと相手に伝わる。
MESSAGE.EN: By transmitting one's memories, one could convey their thoughts to someone else.
MESSAGE.Translation: By transmitting one's memories, one could convey their thoughts to someone else.

MESSAGE.JP: れ込んでくるのは、黒猫のイメージだ。
MESSAGE.EN: And what was currently flowing into me were images that belonged to the black cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: And what was currently flowing into me were images that belonged to the black cat.

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんに起こっていた奇妙な現象は…。
MESSAGE.EN: That strange transformation Sasasegawa-san had been experiencing...
MESSAGE.Translation: That strange transformation Sasasegawa-san had been experiencing...

MESSAGE.JP: の世界では、笹瀬川さんであって、猫であったからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was due to the fact that in this world she's not only a girl called Sasasegawa-san, but also the cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was due to the fact that in this world she's not only a girl called Sasasegawa-san, but also the cat.

MESSAGE.JP: っと黒猫は、笹瀬川さんの中で隠れていたんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: The black cat must have been hiding inside her all along.
MESSAGE.Translation: The black cat must have been hiding inside her all along.

MESSAGE.JP: ることも出来ない、隠れ場所に。
MESSAGE.EN: He must have been hiding in some unreachable part of her mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: He must have been hiding in some unreachable part of her mind.

MESSAGE.JP: れに誰かが気づいて、連れ出してくれるまで。
MESSAGE.EN: He had to keep himself hidden until someone noticed him.
MESSAGE.Translation: He had to keep himself hidden until someone noticed him.

MESSAGE.JP: れど、笹瀬川さんはそれをずっと、拒み続けていた。
MESSAGE.EN: However, Sasasegawa-san herself had been rejecting such awareness.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, Sasasegawa-san herself had been rejecting such awareness.

MESSAGE.JP: だったら、僕は、これを。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Then if I...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Then if I...

MESSAGE.JP: むことなく、受け入れれば…。
MESSAGE.EN: If I became the one to accept it...
MESSAGE.Translation: If I became the one to accept it...

MESSAGE.JP: がて、漠然とした何かは形を成していく。
MESSAGE.EN: Little by little, something vague began to take shape.
MESSAGE.Translation: Little by little, something vague began to take shape.

MESSAGE.JP: 体は固体になり、明瞭に動き始める。
MESSAGE.EN: It turned from liquid to solid, and then started to move.
MESSAGE.Translation: It turned from liquid to solid, and then started to move.

MESSAGE.JP: れど、それはどこか平面的でもあって。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet it also looked flat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet it also looked flat.

MESSAGE.JP: えるなら、これは古い映画だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was just like an old movie.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was just like an old movie.

MESSAGE.JP: 黒で、ノイズ交じりの映像。
MESSAGE.EN: A monochrome motion picture with background noise.
MESSAGE.Translation: A monochrome motion picture with background noise.

MESSAGE.JP: きも断片的で、どこか滑稽な、不完全な動画。
MESSAGE.EN: An incomplete video, fragmentary and comedic.
MESSAGE.Translation: An incomplete video, fragmentary and comedic.

MESSAGE.JP: れが明確に知覚できるのは、僕が今、これを夢だと自覚しているから、だろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Now I could clearly perceive it, perhaps because I knew this was a dream.
MESSAGE.Translation: Now I could clearly perceive it, perhaps because I knew this was a dream.

MESSAGE.JP: 晰夢なんて見たことが無いけど、夢っていうのは常にこういうものなのかと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I've never had a lucid dream, but what I'm currently watching made me think that all dreams might be like this.
MESSAGE.Translation: I've never had a lucid dream, but what I'm currently watching made me think that all dreams might be like this.

MESSAGE.JP: して、夢は語り始める。
MESSAGE.EN: And then the dream began telling a story.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then the dream began telling a story.

MESSAGE.JP: ず最初は、幸福な映像。
MESSAGE.EN: At first, visions full of happiness.
MESSAGE.Translation: At first, visions full of happiness.

MESSAGE.JP: 親代わりのヒト。
MESSAGE.EN: The cat was with his surrogate mother.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cat was with his surrogate mother.

MESSAGE.JP: い日は暖かいストーブの近く。
MESSAGE.EN: On cold days, they curled up together by the heater.
MESSAGE.Translation: On cold days, they curled up together by the heater.

MESSAGE.JP: はガラス越しに。
MESSAGE.EN: On rainy days, they watched the rain beating on the windows.
MESSAGE.Translation: On rainy days, they watched the rain beating on the windows.

MESSAGE.JP: れた日は、陽だまりに。
MESSAGE.EN: On sunny days, they basked in the sun.
MESSAGE.Translation: On sunny days, they basked in the sun.

MESSAGE.JP: べ物だって、当たり前にある。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no worry for food.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no worry for food.

MESSAGE.JP: ままな午前。
MESSAGE.EN: In the morning, the cat did whatever he wanted.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the morning, the cat did whatever he wanted.

MESSAGE.JP: やかな午後。
MESSAGE.EN: In the afternoon, he spent his time relaxing.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the afternoon, he spent his time relaxing.

MESSAGE.JP: れは本当に、幸せな生活だった。
MESSAGE.EN: The cat was living a really, really happy life.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cat was living a really, really happy life.

MESSAGE.JP: して、何もかもが冷たい日々。
MESSAGE.EN: But then, everything around him turned cold.
MESSAGE.Translation: But then, everything around him turned cold.

MESSAGE.JP: ぐらが崩されていく。
MESSAGE.EN: His den was destroyed.
MESSAGE.Translation: His den was destroyed.

MESSAGE.JP: つもいたヒトたちは、街のどこにもいない。
MESSAGE.EN: The people who had always been around him couldn't be found anywhere in town.
MESSAGE.Translation: The people who had always been around him couldn't be found anywhere in town.

MESSAGE.JP: りだった。
MESSAGE.EN: He was suddenly alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was suddenly alone.

MESSAGE.JP: たり前だった幸福。
MESSAGE.EN: He had thought that happiness would last for all eternity.
MESSAGE.Translation: He had thought that happiness would last for all eternity.

MESSAGE.JP: せな生活。
MESSAGE.EN: However,
MESSAGE.Translation: However,

MESSAGE.JP: たり前は何一つとして残っていない。
MESSAGE.EN: now he had nothing left.
MESSAGE.Translation: now he had nothing left.

MESSAGE.JP: しい雨の日も。
MESSAGE.EN: Days of heavy rain.
MESSAGE.Translation: Days of heavy rain.

MESSAGE.JP: える雪の日も。
MESSAGE.EN: Days of freezing snow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Days of freezing snow.

MESSAGE.JP: だ、食べるものを探し回った。
MESSAGE.EN: No matter what kind of day, he would spend it looking for food.
MESSAGE.Translation: No matter what kind of day, he would spend it looking for food.

MESSAGE.JP: しいヒトもいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Some treated him kindly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Some treated him kindly.

MESSAGE.JP: れど、大半は無関心。
MESSAGE.EN: But most people paid him no heed.
MESSAGE.Translation: But most people paid him no heed.

MESSAGE.JP: 酷なヒトだっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: And some treated him cruelly.
MESSAGE.Translation: And some treated him cruelly.

MESSAGE.JP: だひたすら、生きていくだけで精一杯だった。
MESSAGE.EN: He did everything he could to live on.
MESSAGE.Translation: He did everything he could to live on.

MESSAGE.JP: じような仲間と一緒になったこともあった。
MESSAGE.EN: For a while, he stayed with other cats in a similar situation.
MESSAGE.Translation: For a while, he stayed with other cats in a similar situation.

MESSAGE.JP: べ物は、奪い合い。
MESSAGE.EN: They fought each other for food.
MESSAGE.Translation: They fought each other for food.

MESSAGE.JP: がつけばいなくなっている仲間もいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Before he noticed, some of them were gone.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before he noticed, some of them were gone.

MESSAGE.JP: んな風にして、だんだんと減っていき。
MESSAGE.EN: And one after another, they disappeared the same way.
MESSAGE.Translation: And one after another, they disappeared the same way.

MESSAGE.JP: 後は、誰もいなくなった。
MESSAGE.EN: Eventually he found himself on his own.
MESSAGE.Translation: Eventually he found himself on his own.

MESSAGE.JP: 張りを追われる。
MESSAGE.EN: He was even chased out of his territory.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was even chased out of his territory.

MESSAGE.JP: れでも、生きていく。
MESSAGE.EN: But nonetheless, he kept struggling to live on.
MESSAGE.Translation: But nonetheless, he kept struggling to live on.

MESSAGE.JP: には、どんな気持ちで生きていっているのかわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I have no idea what he might have felt during those days.
MESSAGE.Translation: I have no idea what he might have felt during those days.

MESSAGE.JP: だ、この子は生きていた。
MESSAGE.EN: But one thing was for certain: the cat did survive.
MESSAGE.Translation: But one thing was for certain: the cat did survive.

MESSAGE.JP: 度目かの春だろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Several springs later.
MESSAGE.Translation: Several springs later.

MESSAGE.JP: の子は、見る影もないほどぼろぼろになりながら。
MESSAGE.EN: The cat was now so worn down that he bore no resemblance to his former self.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cat was now so worn down that he bore no resemblance to his former self.

MESSAGE.JP: れでも、生きていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet he kept on living.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet he kept on living.

MESSAGE.JP: がて、ある学校にたどり着く。
MESSAGE.EN: One day, he reached a school.
MESSAGE.Translation: One day, he reached a school.

MESSAGE.JP: には見慣れた光景。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a place I saw almost every day.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a place I saw almost every day.

MESSAGE.JP: でに、自分の命は長くないと、自覚できるほどの身体になって。
MESSAGE.EN: He was so weak at that point that he could tell he wasn't going to last much longer.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was so weak at that point that he could tell he wasn't going to last much longer.

MESSAGE.JP: こで、母親代わりだったヒトと、再会する。
MESSAGE.EN: And there he saw his mother figure again.
MESSAGE.Translation: And there he saw his mother figure again.

MESSAGE.JP: の子には、笹瀬川さんのことがわかっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: He recognized her; he recognized Sasasegawa-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: He recognized her; he recognized Sasasegawa-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんには、この猫のことはわかっていなかったけれど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But she did not recognize him.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But she did not recognize him.

MESSAGE.JP: 理もない。
MESSAGE.EN: Who could blame her?
MESSAGE.Translation: Who could blame her?

MESSAGE.JP: 年も野良猫の辛い生活をしてきて、風貌もすっかり変わってしまっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: After living the rough life of a stray for years, his appearance had completely changed.
MESSAGE.Translation: After living the rough life of a stray for years, his appearance had completely changed.

MESSAGE.JP: れが目印になったはずの、首輪もとうに千切れてなくなっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: If he'd still worn his collar, it would have reminded her of him, but that too was long gone.
MESSAGE.Translation: If he'd still worn his collar, it would have reminded her of him, but that too was long gone.

MESSAGE.JP: から、拒絶された。
MESSAGE.EN: And thus, he was rejected by her.
MESSAGE.Translation: And thus, he was rejected by her.

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんにとっては、もう黒猫は、ただの辛い過去の象徴でしかないから。
MESSAGE.EN: To her, the black cat was nothing but a symbol of her bitter past.
MESSAGE.Translation: To her, the black cat was nothing but a symbol of her bitter past.

MESSAGE.JP: 好きなはずの猫でも、嫌いにならなきゃいけないくらいだったから。
MESSAGE.EN: She had loved him so dearly, but to be able to put him behind her, she'd had to make herself hate him.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had loved him so dearly, but to be able to put him behind her, she'd had to make herself hate him.

MESSAGE.JP: なんでだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: How could that be...?
MESSAGE.Translation: How could that be...?

MESSAGE.JP: っと長い時を経て、こうして再会を果たしたのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Her cat had returned to her after all those years.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her cat had returned to her after all those years.

MESSAGE.JP: れで、笹瀬川さんがまたこの猫と一緒に生活できたら、それでハッピーエンドじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: And if they could live together again, it'd be such a happy ending.
MESSAGE.Translation: And if they could live together again, it'd be such a happy ending.

MESSAGE.JP: え、笹瀬川さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Hey, Sasasegawa-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hey, Sasasegawa-san.

MESSAGE.JP: の猫が、笹瀬川さんの飼ってたあの猫なんだよ。
MESSAGE.EN: This is the cat you were living with.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is the cat you were living with.

MESSAGE.JP: っと、生きてたんだよ。
MESSAGE.EN: He's still alive.
MESSAGE.Translation: He's still alive.

MESSAGE.JP: うして、また会えたんだよ。
MESSAGE.EN: And he's right in front of you.
MESSAGE.Translation: And he's right in front of you.

MESSAGE.JP: え、気づいてよ。
MESSAGE.EN: You have to notice him.
MESSAGE.Translation: You have to notice him.

MESSAGE.JP: これは夢だ。声なんて届くわけもない。
MESSAGE.EN: I know she couldn't hear me. After all, I'm in a dream now.
MESSAGE.Translation: I know she couldn't hear me. After all, I'm in a dream now.

MESSAGE.JP: れど、そうしてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: But I couldn't help but want to tell her that.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I couldn't help but want to tell her that.

MESSAGE.JP: かないものは、届かない。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if you do all you can, there are things that can't be delivered.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if you do all you can, there are things that can't be delivered.

MESSAGE.JP: わらないものは、伝わらない。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if you do all you can, there are things that can't be told.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if you do all you can, there are things that can't be told.

MESSAGE.JP: たり前だけど。
MESSAGE.EN: That was a given.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was a given.

MESSAGE.JP: んて無情な当たり前なんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: But what a merciless reality it was.
MESSAGE.Translation: But what a merciless reality it was.

MESSAGE.JP: ろぼろになって、もう、力尽きる間際なのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Although the cat was about to leave this world,
MESSAGE.Translation: Although the cat was about to leave this world,

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんには、届かない。
MESSAGE.EN: he still couldn't reach Sasasegawa-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: he still couldn't reach Sasasegawa-san.

MESSAGE.JP: こは、この猫にとって、最後の一瞬。
MESSAGE.EN: This world was the last flickering moment of his life.
MESSAGE.Translation: This world was the last flickering moment of his life.

MESSAGE.JP: からこうして、この世界にいるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: And that was why he was here.
MESSAGE.Translation: And that was why he was here.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は…。
だったら、たまらなく悔しくて…。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt so incredibly frustrated...
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt so incredibly frustrated...

MESSAGE.JP: うしようもなく、悲しくて…。
MESSAGE.EN: And extremely sad...
MESSAGE.Translation: And extremely sad...

MESSAGE.JP: れど、何もできないなんて…。
MESSAGE.EN: But I still couldn't do anything for him...
MESSAGE.Translation: But I still couldn't do anything for him...

MESSAGE.JP: ねえ。
MESSAGE.EN: Hey...
MESSAGE.Translation: Hey...

MESSAGE.JP: は、どう思っているの？
MESSAGE.EN: What do you think?
MESSAGE.Translation: What do you think?

MESSAGE.JP: に問いかける。
MESSAGE.EN: I posed to the cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: I posed to the cat.

MESSAGE.JP: は今、記憶を形としてみている。
MESSAGE.EN: His memories were being projected to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: His memories were being projected to me.

MESSAGE.JP: れど、そこにはこの猫の感情は映し出されていない。
MESSAGE.EN: But I couldn't learn his feelings from that.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I couldn't learn his feelings from that.

MESSAGE.JP: 声映画を思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Because it was much like watching a silent movie.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because it was much like watching a silent movie.

MESSAGE.JP: 分、声が一番人の感情を表すもので、それがない無声映画は、極端な動きや表情でそれを伝えるものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Perhaps your voice is what best expresses your feelings, and that must be why the actors in silent movies have to exaggerate their gestures and facial expressions.
MESSAGE.Translation: Perhaps your voice is what best expresses your feelings, and that must be why the actors in silent movies have to exaggerate their gestures and facial expressions.

MESSAGE.JP: うじゃなきゃ、伝わらないから。
MESSAGE.EN: Without doing that, nothing will get through to the audience.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without doing that, nothing will get through to the audience.

MESSAGE.JP: きのない無声映画。
MESSAGE.EN: But the one I was watching had no gestures in it either.
MESSAGE.Translation: But the one I was watching had no gestures in it either.

MESSAGE.JP: 登場人物は何を考えているんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I wondered what those characters were thinking...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered what those characters were thinking...

MESSAGE.JP: れは、僕にはわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't figure it out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't figure it out.

MESSAGE.JP: どかしい。
MESSAGE.EN: And that frustrated me.
MESSAGE.Translation: And that frustrated me.

MESSAGE.EN: Just what...
MESSAGE.Translation: Just what...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「一体、君は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just what...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just what...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「これだけの記憶を抱えて、ここで何を願うの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝With all these memories of yours, just what do you wish for in this world?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝With all these memories of yours, just what do you wish for in this world?❞

MESSAGE.JP: いかける。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked.

MESSAGE.JP: 答えは、ない。
MESSAGE.EN: No answer came back.
MESSAGE.Translation: No answer came back.

MESSAGE.JP: の子は、ずっと笹瀬川さんにも伝えたかったんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure he wanted to convey his feelings to Sasasegawa-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure he wanted to convey his feelings to Sasasegawa-san.

MESSAGE.JP: ど、出来ないことだったんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: But he has never been able to do it.
MESSAGE.Translation: But he has never been able to do it.

MESSAGE.JP: って、僕にすら伝わらないんだから。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, he couldn't even tell me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, he couldn't even tell me.

MESSAGE.JP: っとそれは、すごく難しいことなんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It must have been amazingly difficult to do.
MESSAGE.Translation: It must have been amazingly difficult to do.

MESSAGE.JP: って、言葉があっても、伝えられない気持ちなんていっぱいあるんだから…。
MESSAGE.EN: Even with words, there are feelings that one can't get through to another.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even with words, there are feelings that one can't get through to another.

MESSAGE.JP: が覚める。
MESSAGE.EN: I woke up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I woke up.

MESSAGE.JP: は、ベッドの上だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I was in bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was in bed.

MESSAGE.JP: 本当なら、真人が寝ているはずの、ベッドの上。
MESSAGE.EN: The top bed, on which Masato's supposed to sleep...
MESSAGE.Translation: The top bed, on which Masato's supposed to sleep...

MESSAGE.JP: が覚めたってことは、さっきまで寝ていたってこと。
MESSAGE.EN: My awakening meant that I'd been asleep just a minute ago.
MESSAGE.Translation: My awakening meant that I'd been asleep just a minute ago.

MESSAGE.JP: して、夢は…。
MESSAGE.EN: And the dream that I saw...
MESSAGE.Translation: And the dream that I saw...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（ちゃんと全部、覚えてる…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(I remember it all...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(I remember it all...)

MESSAGE.JP: れが本当に夢なのかどうかなんて、どうでもいい。
MESSAGE.EN: It didn't matter whether it was real or not.
MESSAGE.Translation: It didn't matter whether it was real or not.

MESSAGE.JP: ってここは、本当でもなんでもない世界なんだから。
MESSAGE.EN: Because this world itself wasn't real.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because this world itself wasn't real.

MESSAGE.JP: いうことは。
MESSAGE.EN: So what I had to do was...
MESSAGE.Translation: So what I had to do was...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「笹瀬川さんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: はベッドを飛び降りる。
MESSAGE.EN: I jumped out of bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I jumped out of bed.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ねえ、笹瀬川さん!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wake up, Sasasegawa-san!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wake up, Sasasegawa-san!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…ん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「なんですの…うるさいですわね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝What is happening? You are being too loud...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝What is happening? You are being too loud...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「わかったんだ!!　全部わかったんだ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I figured it out! I figured everything out!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I figured it out! I figured everything out!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「なにがですの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Everything about what...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Everything about what...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だから、全部だよ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I figured everything out!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I figured everything out!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ああ、あの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Ugh, geez...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Ugh, geez...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「それは、もちろん聞きたいのですけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I would love to hear it, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I would love to hear it, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「その、顔、近すぎますから…どけてほしいのですけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Your face is a little too close for comfort... Would you mind getting off...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Your face is a little too close for comfort... Would you mind getting off...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ…ご、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah.. S-Sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah.. S-Sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっと興奮しすぎてた…。
MESSAGE.EN: I had gotten too excited...
MESSAGE.Translation: I had gotten too excited...

MESSAGE.JP: を取り直して。
MESSAGE.EN: I collected myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I collected myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「それで…何がわかったんですの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Well then... What is it you have figured out?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Well then... What is it you have figured out?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「『マスター』のことだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝About the ❛master.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝About the ❛master.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もう、いる場所もわかってるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I know where they are.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I know where they are.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「どこですの、それはっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Where are they!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Where are they!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「こうしちゃいられませんわっ。早速行きますわよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝We have no time to sit around like this! Hurry up and lead the way!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝We have no time to sit around like this! Hurry up and lead the way!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ま、待って待ってっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝H-Hold on a second!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝H-Hold on a second!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「なんですの!?　この世界から抜け出せるなら、さっさとそうしますわよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝What is it!? Why would you want to stay here a moment longer when we might be able to get out of here!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝What is it!? Why would you want to stay here a moment longer when we might be able to get out of here!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だ、だって、その…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's because, well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's because, well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「なんですの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝What is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝What is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もうちょっと、落ち着いて僕の話を聞いてほしいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I want you to calm down and listen to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I want you to calm down and listen to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんが腰を落ち着ける。
MESSAGE.EN: She seated herself back down.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seated herself back down.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「なんですの、改まって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝What is it now? You look very serious.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝What is it now? You look very serious.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「笹瀬川さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「だから、なんですの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Geez, just say what it is you have to say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Geez, just say what it is you have to say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…『マスター』の隠れ場所なんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The ❛master❜...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The ❛master❜...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今は、あの行けなかった校舎裏にいる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝They're currently behind the school building, in that place we couldn't enter earlier.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝They're currently behind the school building, in that place we couldn't enter earlier.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「今は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Currently?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Currently?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「じゃあ、わたくしたちが探し回ってる間は、どこにいたんですの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Where were they when we sought them, then?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Where were they when we sought them, then?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕らは、ずっと見当違いのところを探してたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We've been searching in the wrong places all along.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We've been searching in the wrong places all along.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ど、どこにいたんですの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝W-Where have they been?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝W-Where have they been?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「笹瀬川さんの、中だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right inside you, Sasasegawa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right inside you, Sasasegawa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「つまり…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I mean...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I mean...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「笹瀬川さんが変身してた、猫だったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The master is the cat that you've been transforming into.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The master is the cat that you've been transforming into.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「意識は笹瀬川さんのものだったから、笹瀬川さんが変身しちゃったものだと思ってたんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I thought you were transforming into the cat, since your consciousness remained while in that form.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I thought you were transforming into the cat, since your consciousness remained while in that form.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あれは、二つのものが一緒にいる、っていうことだったんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But the truth is, your mind has been in that cat's body.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But the truth is, your mind has been in that cat's body.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あの黒猫が、マスターだったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And that black cat is the master of this world.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And that black cat is the master of this world.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「笹瀬川さんの中に閉じこもってて、それで隠れてたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He's hidden himself away inside of you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He's hidden himself away inside of you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れは、笹瀬川さんに伝えたいことがあったから。
MESSAGE.EN: And it's because he had something he wanted to tell her.
MESSAGE.Translation: And it's because he had something he wanted to tell her.

MESSAGE.JP: れで、笹瀬川さんには何も伝わらないで…傍観者だった僕にそれが伝わったっていうのは。
MESSAGE.EN: However, he hadn't been able to... and I found out instead.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, he hadn't been able to... and I found out instead.

MESSAGE.JP: いやな、皮肉だった。
MESSAGE.EN: What horrible irony...
MESSAGE.Translation: What horrible irony...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…それで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「その猫っていうのは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That cat is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That cat is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「笹瀬川さんの飼ってた、黒猫なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The one that you used to have as a pet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The one that you used to have as a pet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「そうですの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「本当に薄々ですけど、もしかしたら…そうじゃないかとは思ってましたわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It was only the slightest hunch... but I did suspect that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It was only the slightest hunch... but I did suspect that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ですけど、この黒猫っていうのは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝But this black cat is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝But this black cat is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…学校にいた、黒猫だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes... It's the black cat we saw back when we were in school in the real world.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes... It's the black cat we saw back when we were in school in the real world.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「笹瀬川さんにずっとくっついて回ってたのは、そういうことなんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And now we know why he followed you around like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And now we know why he followed you around like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は前に、あの黒猫と笹瀬川さんの飼っている黒猫について考えたけど。
MESSAGE.EN: I once tried to figure out if there was some connection between that black stray and Sasasegawa-san's cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: I once tried to figure out if there was some connection between that black stray and Sasasegawa-san's cat.

MESSAGE.JP: れは、完全にイコールでつながっていたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: And in the end, they turned out to be one and the same.
MESSAGE.Translation: And in the end, they turned out to be one and the same.

MESSAGE.JP: だそれだけなのに、ずいぶん遠回りをしてしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Although the answer was that simple, I ended up taking such a long route to arrive at it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although the answer was that simple, I ended up taking such a long route to arrive at it.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ずっと、生きてたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He's still alive.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He's still alive.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それで、ここにたどり着いたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And he's here now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And he's here now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「見た目も何もかも、すっかり変わっちゃってたけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝His appearance and everything have changed...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝His appearance and everything have changed...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「笹瀬川さんと、再会出来てたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But he finally managed to see you again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But he finally managed to see you again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんは、目を伏せて、ずっと黙ったままだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasasegawa-san was silent for a long time, her eyes cast down.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san was silent for a long time, her eyes cast down.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「どれくらいのあいだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝How long...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝How long...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あの子は、野良猫として過ごしていたんでしょうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝How long has he been living as a stray, I wonder.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝How long has he been living as a stray, I wonder.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…誰にも、拾われることはなかったのかしら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Nobody ever took him in?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Nobody ever took him in?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ずっと、野良猫だったみたいだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It seems he's been on his own ever since he got separated from you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It seems he's been on his own ever since he got separated from you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…そう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ずっと、長い間ですのね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝All these years...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝All these years...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「もし、ですわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Supposing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Supposing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ここで、会いに行って…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Supposing I were to meet up with him here again,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Supposing I were to meet up with him here again,❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「元の世界に帰って…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝and return to the real world...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝and return to the real world...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「そうしたら、あの子と生きていくことは、出来るんですの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Will I be able to live with him there...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Will I be able to live with him there...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: れはきっと、出来ない。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't think she could.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't think she could.

MESSAGE.JP: こでこうしているのは、あの子の最後の望みなんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I believe we were here because this was his final wish.
MESSAGE.Translation: I believe we were here because this was his final wish.

MESSAGE.JP: あれだけぼろぼろの身体を救うことなんて、きっと無理だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It would likely be impossible for his tattered body to recover.
MESSAGE.Translation: It would likely be impossible for his tattered body to recover.

MESSAGE.JP: えない。
MESSAGE.EN: No one could save him.
MESSAGE.Translation: No one could save him.

MESSAGE.JP: は、首を横に振ることしか出来なかった。
MESSAGE.EN: All I could do was shake my head in denial.
MESSAGE.Translation: All I could do was shake my head in denial.

MESSAGE.JP: た、沈黙。
MESSAGE.EN: Another silence followed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Another silence followed.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…あの、時計」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Look at that clock...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Look at that clock...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「デジタル時計、点が明滅しますわよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝That digital clock keeps blinking away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝That digital clock keeps blinking away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ああ、一秒を表してるやつだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, that counts by seconds...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, that counts by seconds...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あの明滅を見ていると、何か…不思議な気持ちになりますわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Seeing that blinking... makes me feel somewhat strange...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Seeing that blinking... makes me feel somewhat strange...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「そのたびに時間はどんどん過ぎていって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Each time it blinks, time passes by...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Each time it blinks, time passes by...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「取り返しのつかないことは、どんどん増えていくんですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝And the more time goes by, the more things there will be left behind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝And the more time goes by, the more things there will be left behind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「たまに、明日なんて来なければいいのにと思いますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Sometimes I wish tomorrow would never come.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Sometimes I wish tomorrow would never come.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…誰だって、そう思うときはあると思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think that's something everyone occasionally wishes for...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think that's something everyone occasionally wishes for...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「みんな、強制だから前に進むんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We move forward because we're compelled to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We move forward because we're compelled to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「みんなが戻せたり、とどまったり出来るなら…一生明日なんて来ないと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If we could go back in time, or stay at a certain point of time... there would never be any tomorrows.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If we could go back in time, or stay at a certain point of time... there would never be any tomorrows.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「わかってますわよ…ちょっと、そう思ってしまっただけですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I know... it is merely something that crossed my mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I know... it is merely something that crossed my mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しいときに戻ったりとどまったり出来ないように、過去の辛いことだって無くしに行ったり出来ない。
MESSAGE.EN: Just like you can't slip back to a fun time and stay there, you can't erase the hard times of the past.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just like you can't slip back to a fun time and stay there, you can't erase the hard times of the past.

MESSAGE.JP: 悔って、そういうものだから。
MESSAGE.EN: That's how regrets are born.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's how regrets are born.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…笹瀬川さんにとって、辛いことかもしれないけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I know it isn't easy for you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I know it isn't easy for you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それでもさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕は、行った方がいいと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think you should go see him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think you should go see him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんは、いくつあのデジタル時計が明滅する間、後悔していたんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: How many blinks will she let the clock waste while she's wallowing in regret?
MESSAGE.Translation: How many blinks will she let the clock waste while she's wallowing in regret?

MESSAGE.JP: きっと、猫を思い出すたびに、自分を責め続けてきたんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: She probably blames herself every time she remembers the cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: She probably blames herself every time she remembers the cat.

MESSAGE.JP: の言葉なんて、すごく無責任だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Whatever I say, it'll just sound irresponsible.
MESSAGE.Translation: Whatever I say, it'll just sound irresponsible.

MESSAGE.JP: れでも、僕は訊かなきゃいけない。
MESSAGE.EN: Even so, I must ask her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even so, I must ask her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…どうする？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What are you going to do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What are you going to do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: し目を伏せて、考えた後。
MESSAGE.EN: She thought about it for a moment while looking at the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: She thought about it for a moment while looking at the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんは立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: She then got to her feet.
MESSAGE.Translation: She then got to her feet.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「わかりましたわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I will do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I will do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: いに行こう。
MESSAGE.EN: Let's go to him.
MESSAGE.Translation: Let's go to him.

MESSAGE.JP: っと、待ってるから。
MESSAGE.EN: He's been waiting for you.
MESSAGE.Translation: He's been waiting for you.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…変わって、ませんわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝He has not changed a bit, has he...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝He has not changed a bit, has he...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「いつもどこかに隠れて、わたくしを困らせるんですわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Always hiding somewhere and giving me trouble...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Always hiding somewhere and giving me trouble...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「いつだって、そうでした…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝He always used to do that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝He always used to do that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…笹瀬川さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんは、無言でドアノブに手を掛けて。
MESSAGE.EN: She silently grabbed hold of the door knob.
MESSAGE.Translation: She silently grabbed hold of the door knob.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Oh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Oh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: のままの姿で、外に出た。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't turn into the cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't turn into the cat.

MESSAGE.JP: それは、もう笹瀬川さんの中に、あの猫はいないということ。
MESSAGE.EN: And that meant the cat was no longer inside her.
MESSAGE.Translation: And that meant the cat was no longer inside her.

MESSAGE.JP: ってるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He was waiting for her.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was waiting for her.

MESSAGE.JP: ここにいる』って言った、あの場所で。
MESSAGE.EN: He was waiting at that place.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was waiting at that place.

MESSAGE.JP: に出る。
MESSAGE.EN: We went outside.
MESSAGE.Translation: We went outside.

MESSAGE.JP: う誰も残ってないから、当然なんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Not to mention that...
MESSAGE.Translation: Not to mention that...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「本当に、静かだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It really has gotten quiet here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It really has gotten quiet here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: すら吹いていない中庭には、僕らの足音だけが響いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There wasn't even the rustling of wind in the courtyard. Only the sound of our footsteps could be heard.
MESSAGE.Translation: There wasn't even the rustling of wind in the courtyard. Only the sound of our footsteps could be heard.

MESSAGE.JP: こまで何一つ動かない世界なんて、初めてだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd never been anywhere this motionless.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd never been anywhere this motionless.

MESSAGE.JP: の世界じゃ、どれだけ静かでも、耳を澄ませば周りから何かの音は聞こえてきたから。
MESSAGE.EN: No matter how quiet it was in the real world, there was always some noise if you listened for it.
MESSAGE.Translation: No matter how quiet it was in the real world, there was always some noise if you listened for it.

MESSAGE.JP: こじゃ、僕らは異物でしかないんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: The two of us must be something like aliens here.
MESSAGE.Translation: The two of us must be something like aliens here.

MESSAGE.JP: 弱々しい世界。
MESSAGE.EN: The world was horribly frail...
MESSAGE.Translation: The world was horribly frail...

MESSAGE.JP: う、ほとんど何も動かすことが出来ない世界。
MESSAGE.EN: The master could hardly keep it running anymore.
MESSAGE.Translation: The master could hardly keep it running anymore.

MESSAGE.JP: のみんなのことを、ふと考える。
MESSAGE.EN: I suddenly thought about everybody else.
MESSAGE.Translation: I suddenly thought about everybody else.

MESSAGE.JP: れはきっと、退場『させられた』わけじゃなくて、退場『させなきゃいけなかった』んじゃないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess they hadn't been forced out, but the master had to let them out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess they hadn't been forced out, but the master had to let them out.

MESSAGE.JP: うしなきゃ、維持もままならないから…。
MESSAGE.EN: Otherwise, he couldn't keep running the world...
MESSAGE.Translation: Otherwise, he couldn't keep running the world...

MESSAGE.JP: の静寂は、そうして息も絶え絶えに繋いで創ったもの。
MESSAGE.EN: The silence was only disturbed by our breathing.
MESSAGE.Translation: The silence was only disturbed by our breathing.

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんは、その静寂の中を、無言で歩いていく。
MESSAGE.EN: In that silence, Sasasegawa-san walked silently ahead.
MESSAGE.Translation: In that silence, Sasasegawa-san walked silently ahead.

MESSAGE.JP: を、思ってるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: What could she have been thinking?
MESSAGE.Translation: What could she have been thinking?

MESSAGE.JP: には、それもわからない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't even tell...
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't even tell...

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: た、入れない…!?
MESSAGE.EN: We couldn't make it there again...!?
MESSAGE.Translation: We couldn't make it there again...!?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんなことって…!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, this can't be happening...!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, this can't be happening...!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 度やっても入れない。
MESSAGE.EN: No matter how many times I tried, I couldn't go any further.
MESSAGE.Translation: No matter how many times I tried, I couldn't go any further.

MESSAGE.JP: こに、壁がある。
MESSAGE.EN: There was an invisible wall in front of us.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was an invisible wall in front of us.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうしてさっ…どうして、まだ壁があるのさっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why... Why's the wall here again!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why... Why's the wall here again!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「会わなきゃいけないんでしょ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You have to see her, don't you!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You have to see her, don't you!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうしなきゃいけないはずなのに…!!　どうしてなんだ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's what you're supposed to do...!! Why are you doing this!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's what you're supposed to do...!! Why are you doing this!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: を叩く。
MESSAGE.EN: I hit the wall.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hit the wall.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どこか、別の場所は…!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There must be another way in somewhere...!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There must be another way in somewhere...!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 探り、探してみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I slid my hands along the wall to find it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I slid my hands along the wall to find it.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…もういいですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Enough already...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Enough already...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「このまま、やっぱり…ここを出ましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝After all... we should just get out of here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝After all... we should just get out of here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「さ、笹瀬川さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sa-Sasasegawa-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sa-Sasasegawa-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「よくなんてないよ!!　これじゃ何もないじゃないか!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We're not going to do that!! Otherwise there'll be nothing left!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We're not going to do that!! Otherwise there'll be nothing left!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何のためにここはあったのさ…!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You know why this was created...!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You know why this was created...!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あなたは、何のためにここにいましたの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Why are you even still here...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Why are you even still here...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あなたは、もう十分過ぎるほど頑張ってくれましたわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You have already done more than enough for me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You have already done more than enough for me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「だから、もういいんですの。ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝So this is enough. Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝So this is enough. Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんは僕に背を向けて、言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She turned her back to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She turned her back to me.

MESSAGE.JP: して…そのまま、歩き出す。
MESSAGE.EN: And she started walking away.
MESSAGE.Translation: And she started walking away.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「な、なんだよそれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W-What's with you...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W-What's with you...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もう、目の前じゃないか!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He's right over there!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He's right over there!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あと、この壁一枚じゃないか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's just this one single wall between you and him now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's just this one single wall between you and him now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だったら、もう少し…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We shouldn't stop here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We shouldn't stop here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「もう、いいんですのよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I already said this was enough!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I already said this was enough!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あなたは一体、なんですの!?　私の古い傷をつついて…!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Who do you think you are!? Why do you insist on reopening old wounds...!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Who do you think you are!? Why do you insist on reopening old wounds...!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「死ぬ間際のあの子に会える…!?　それがなんなんですの!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝What is the point in seeing him when he is about to die!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝What is the point in seeing him when he is about to die!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「わたくしは、どんな顔をしてあの子に会えばいいんですの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝What kind of face am I supposed to make when I see him!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝What kind of face am I supposed to make when I see him!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そ、そんなの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝T-That's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝T-That's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「それに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Besides...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Besides...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あの子はきっと、わたくしをずっと恨んでいましたわよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I am certain he has hated me all this time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I am certain he has hated me all this time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「置いていったのは、わたくしですもの…!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It was I who left him behind...!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It was I who left him behind...!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「わたくしが馬鹿だったせいですもの…!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I abandoned him because I was such an idiot...!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I abandoned him because I was such an idiot...!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「だから、ずっとこんな真似をしていたんじゃありませんの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝And that is why he put me in a world like this, is it not!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝And that is why he put me in a world like this, is it not!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それを確かめに来たんじゃないか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Didn't we come here to discover the truth...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Didn't we come here to discover the truth...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「それなら何も知らないままでここを出て行ったほうがいいですわっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Then I would rather leave this place without learning any more than this!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Then I would rather leave this place without learning any more than this!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: んなことを言われたら、何も言えない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't say anything back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't say anything back.

MESSAGE.JP: かに、あの猫は笹瀬川さんに会いたがってる。
MESSAGE.EN: That cat truly wanted to see her.
MESSAGE.Translation: That cat truly wanted to see her.

MESSAGE.JP: も、それは何のため？
MESSAGE.EN: But for what reason?
MESSAGE.Translation: But for what reason?

MESSAGE.JP: れは、僕にだってわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no idea.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no idea.

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんへの復讐？
MESSAGE.EN: Was he holding a grudge against Sasasegawa-san?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was he holding a grudge against Sasasegawa-san?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（そんなのって、ないよ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(That can't be true...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(That can't be true...)

MESSAGE.JP: うけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Even so,
MESSAGE.Translation: Even so,

MESSAGE.JP: り得ない話じゃないから…。
MESSAGE.EN: since we didn't know the truth, I couldn't argue with her...
MESSAGE.Translation: since we didn't know the truth, I couldn't argue with her...

MESSAGE.JP: 得できないし、信じたくもないけど。
MESSAGE.EN: But I could neither accept nor believe that was the case.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I could neither accept nor believe that was the case.

MESSAGE.JP: の気持ちは、わからなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no way I could have known the cat's motive.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no way I could have known the cat's motive.

MESSAGE.JP: より、拒絶しているのは笹瀬川さんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: More importantly, Sasasegawa-san wouldn't even see him.
MESSAGE.Translation: More importantly, Sasasegawa-san wouldn't even see him.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕にその気持ちを溶かすことは、できるのか？
MESSAGE.EN: ...Would I be able to convince her?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Would I be able to convince her?

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…行きましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...Let us go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...Let us go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「行くって、どこに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Where to?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Where to?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「出口ですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝The exit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝The exit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「本当は、見つけてあったんですの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝To tell the truth, I already found it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝To tell the truth, I already found it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…でも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝But...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝But...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんは、また無言で歩き出した。
MESSAGE.EN: She began walking off silently.
MESSAGE.Translation: She began walking off silently.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだったんだ、この世界は。
MESSAGE.EN: ...What had this world been for, really?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...What had this world been for, really?

MESSAGE.JP: のまま外に出たら、これは夢として忘れてしまうんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: If we left, would it be forgotten like a dream?
MESSAGE.Translation: If we left, would it be forgotten like a dream?

MESSAGE.JP: の猫も、人知れず死んでいくんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: And would the cat die alone without anyone knowing?
MESSAGE.Translation: And would the cat die alone without anyone knowing?

MESSAGE.JP: それは、ごく当たり前のことだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...There's really nothing unusual about that. It's something that happens all the time.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...There's really nothing unusual about that. It's something that happens all the time.

MESSAGE.JP: しろ、ここがあったことのほうが異常なんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Or rather, what was abnormal was the existence of this world.
MESSAGE.Translation: Or rather, what was abnormal was the existence of this world.

MESSAGE.JP: そんなのって、ないよ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Despite that, I couldn't accept this.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Despite that, I couldn't accept this.

MESSAGE.JP: んなこと、きっと…どこでだって起きてることだ。
MESSAGE.EN: A stray cat dies of illness.
MESSAGE.Translation: A stray cat dies of illness.

MESSAGE.JP: 良猫が、病気で死んでしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: It's a common, everyday story.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's a common, everyday story.

MESSAGE.JP: も、僕の見てないどこかで起こっていたって…。
MESSAGE.EN: But even so...
MESSAGE.Translation: But even so...

MESSAGE.JP: 知ってしまったら、何も考えずに見過ごすなんて出来ないじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Since I knew what was about to occur, how could I turn a blind eye to it?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Since I knew what was about to occur, how could I turn a blind eye to it?

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんが見つけた出口。
MESSAGE.EN: The exit Sasasegawa-san found.
MESSAGE.Translation: The exit Sasasegawa-san found.

MESSAGE.JP: それは、校門だった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It was the school gate.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It was the school gate.

MESSAGE.JP: らはあれっきり、一言も口を開かなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Neither of us had spoken since the barrier.
MESSAGE.Translation: Neither of us had spoken since the barrier.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「きっと、ここから、出られますわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I think this is where we will make our exit...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I think this is where we will make our exit...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、本当にここなの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you sure this is it...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you sure this is it...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「学校の外に出られるのはここだけですし…試してみれば、早いですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It is the only place from which you leave school property... We shall find out the truth after we give it a shot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It is the only place from which you leave school property... We shall find out the truth after we give it a shot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…そうなんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's right, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's right, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 当に、こんなことでここから去ってしまって、いいんだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Should we really leave, just like that?
MESSAGE.Translation: Should we really leave, just like that?

MESSAGE.JP: しに一歩、踏み出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried taking a step forward.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried taking a step forward.

MESSAGE.JP: っ白な空間に、確かに足が着いた。
MESSAGE.EN: And I did feel my foot land on the stark white ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I did feel my foot land on the stark white ground.

MESSAGE.JP: こを駆け抜ければきっと、この世界からは抜け出せるんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: That gave me reason to believe it would lead us to the real world.
MESSAGE.Translation: That gave me reason to believe it would lead us to the real world.

MESSAGE.EN: But...
MESSAGE.Translation: But...

MESSAGE.JP: と、気づく。
MESSAGE.EN: I realized something.
MESSAGE.Translation: I realized something.

MESSAGE.JP: 絶してるのは、笹瀬川さんなんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasasegawa-san was the one who wouldn't see the cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san was the one who wouldn't see the cat.

MESSAGE.JP: は、笹瀬川さんに会いたがってるはず。
MESSAGE.EN: He, on the other hand, should have wanted to see her.
MESSAGE.Translation: He, on the other hand, should have wanted to see her.

MESSAGE.JP: すると、あの壁は、もしかして…。
MESSAGE.EN: If that's the case, the wall must still exist because...
MESSAGE.Translation: If that's the case, the wall must still exist because...

MESSAGE.JP: も、それなら、本当にどうしようも…。
MESSAGE.EN: But I had no idea what to do about it...
MESSAGE.Translation: But I had no idea what to do about it...

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: のバランスが崩れる。
MESSAGE.EN: I lost my balance.
MESSAGE.Translation: I lost my balance.

MESSAGE.JP: たらを踏んで、真っ白な空間に、ひざをつく。
MESSAGE.EN: After a few wobbling steps, I dropped to my knee in a white space.
MESSAGE.Translation: After a few wobbling steps, I dropped to my knee in a white space.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What...❞

MESSAGE.JP: き飛ばされた。
MESSAGE.EN: Someone had pushed me forward.
MESSAGE.Translation: Someone had pushed me forward.

MESSAGE.JP: に？
MESSAGE.EN: Who did it?
MESSAGE.Translation: Who did it?

MESSAGE.JP: ひとりしかいない。
MESSAGE.EN: There was only one option.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was only one option.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ど、どういうことっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W-What did you do that for!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W-What did you do that for!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: り向くと。
MESSAGE.EN: As I turned around,
MESSAGE.Translation: As I turned around,

MESSAGE.JP: は、真っ白な空間に。
MESSAGE.EN: I found myself in the white open space,
MESSAGE.Translation: I found myself in the white open space,

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんは、その白の向こうの、校門に。
MESSAGE.EN: and Sasasegawa-san over at the school gate.
MESSAGE.Translation: and Sasasegawa-san over at the school gate.

MESSAGE.JP: に背を向けていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She had her back to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had her back to me.

MESSAGE.JP: のような、白い綿のような何かが舞う。
MESSAGE.EN: There were white particles drifting around me like snow or cotton.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were white particles drifting around me like snow or cotton.

MESSAGE.JP: いや、そんな風流なものじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: No, they were not that artistic.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, they were not that artistic.

MESSAGE.JP: れは、発泡スチロールのくずを舞い上げたような、無機質なもの。
