MESSAGE.EN: They were more like small pieces of styrene foam.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were more like small pieces of styrene foam.

MESSAGE.JP: 界が削れて消えていく、欠片のようなもの。
MESSAGE.EN: The world was being torn into fragments, and they were disappearing.
MESSAGE.Translation: The world was being torn into fragments, and they were disappearing.

MESSAGE.JP: の向こうから、声が聞こえた。
MESSAGE.EN: And from beyond all that, her voice reached my ears.
MESSAGE.Translation: And from beyond all that, her voice reached my ears.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「わたくしは、残りますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I shall stay here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I shall stay here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: どく非現実的な言葉だった。
MESSAGE.EN: The words sounded unreal.
MESSAGE.Translation: The words sounded unreal.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉の意味を理解する。
MESSAGE.EN: At the same time, I understood what that meant.
MESSAGE.Translation: At the same time, I understood what that meant.

MESSAGE.JP: 時に。
MESSAGE.EN: I screamed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I screamed.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「い、意味わかんないよ…!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Y-You're not making any sense...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Y-You're not making any sense...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何でこんなことするの!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why would you do this!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why would you do this!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんの行動の意味が、わからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't figure out why she would want to do that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't figure out why she would want to do that.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「後は、わたくしの問題ですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝The rest is my business.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝The rest is my business.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ふざけないでよっ!!　僕だってここまで来たんだ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Stop messing around!! I've come this far with you!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Stop messing around!! I've come this far with you!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「一緒にここまで来たのに、何で最後まで一緒にいられないんだよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why won't you let me stay with you until the end!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why won't you let me stay with you until the end!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「もしあの子が、悪意でここを作ったとしたら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝If he created this world with some sort of malicious intent,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝If he created this world with some sort of malicious intent,❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「さいごが、本当に最期になってしまうかもしれないでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝the end of it could literally be the end of our lives.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝the end of it could literally be the end of our lives.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そ、そんなのっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝N-No, that's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝N-No, that's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「だから、行きなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝That is why you have to go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝That is why you have to go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「行かないよッ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I won't go!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I won't go!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ろうとする。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to return.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to return.

MESSAGE.JP: 足が雪に埋まったみたいに、動かない。
MESSAGE.EN: However, my feet wouldn't budge, buried deeply in the fragments of the world.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, my feet wouldn't budge, buried deeply in the fragments of the world.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「くっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ugh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ugh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: れない。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I couldn't go back,
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I couldn't go back,

MESSAGE.JP: 退ることは出来る。
MESSAGE.EN: I could go in the other direction.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could go in the other direction.

MESSAGE.JP: れど、一度下がってしまうと、もうそこから前には進めない。
MESSAGE.EN: However, if I stepped that way, I couldn't step back anymore.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, if I stepped that way, I couldn't step back anymore.

MESSAGE.JP: れることは出来ても、もう戻れない。
MESSAGE.EN: I can go away from her, but can't bring myself even a little closer to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can go away from her, but can't bring myself even a little closer to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「おかしいでしょ…!!　どうして最後だけ一人なのさ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This is so wrong...!! Why can't I be with you at the end of this!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This is so wrong...!! Why can't I be with you at the end of this!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「会いに行くんでしょ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're going to see him, aren't you!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're going to see him, aren't you!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だったら…!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If so, let me come with you...!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If so, let me come with you...!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「笹瀬川さん、むちゃくちゃだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san, you're just messing everything up!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san, you're just messing everything up!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「言ってることもやってることも本心もっ!!　矛盾だらけでむちゃくちゃだよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Everything you say, you do, you think!! None of it makes any sense!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Everything you say, you do, you think!! None of it makes any sense!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…わかってますわよ、そんなこと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I do know that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I do know that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「わかってないよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, you don't!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, you don't!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「それでももう、こう決めましたのっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Even so, I have already made up my mind to do this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Even so, I have already made up my mind to do this.❞

MESSAGE.EN: What...
MESSAGE.Translation: What...

MESSAGE.JP: んだよ、それっ。
MESSAGE.EN: What the hell was she saying?
MESSAGE.Translation: What the hell was she saying?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「このっ…分からず屋ぁあぁーーーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You... you stubborn fool!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You... you stubborn fool!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「わかっていないのはあなたのほうですわっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You are the one who does not understand!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You are the one who does not understand!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あなたまで帰れなくなったらどうするんですの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝What if you cannot return to the real world either!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝What if you cannot return to the real world either!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だって、だって、これまで笹瀬川さん、一人じゃ何も出来なかったじゃないか!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You haven't been able to do anything without me so far!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You haven't been able to do anything without me so far!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ひとりじゃ無理でも、ふたりならできることっていっぱいあるでしょっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There are many things that you can't do on your own, but can do with someone else!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There are many things that you can't do on your own, but can do with someone else!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「大体、僕にそう言ったのは笹瀬川さんじゃないか…!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝In the first place, weren't you the one to tell me that...!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝In the first place, weren't you the one to tell me that...!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あなたが今ここでここから逃げれば、あなたは確実に助かるじゃありませんの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝If you leave here now, you will most certainly survive.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝If you leave here now, you will most certainly survive.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でもっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、ここまで来たんだよ!!　僕は最後に帰れなくなったって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I've come this far with you!! Even if I can't get back...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I've come this far with you!! Even if I can't get back...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「かまわないって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You do not mind...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You do not mind...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「そんなことをあなたが言っても、わたくしがかまうんですのっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Even if you do not, I do mind!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Even if you do not, I do mind!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「だからあなたは何もわかってないって言うんですわ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝And that is why I say you understand nothing at all!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝And that is why I say you understand nothing at all!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「わ、わたくしは、もう…とっくにっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I-I already...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I-I already...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あなたのことが好きになってしまってますのっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I already fell in love with you!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I already fell in love with you!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「だからこんなに悩んでいたんじゃありませんのっ!!　そんなこともわからなくて!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝That is the reason I have been worrying myself over this!! Can you not even understand that!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝That is the reason I have been worrying myself over this!! Can you not even understand that!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: え。
MESSAGE.EN: Eh...
MESSAGE.Translation: Eh...

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「最悪ですわよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝This is the worst...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝This is the worst...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「だからっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝And that is why...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝And that is why...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「わたくしは、あなたと心中するくらいなら、あなただけでもここから逃げてほしいんですの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Rather than both of us dying in here, I would rather you escape.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Rather than both of us dying in here, I would rather you escape.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そ、そんなこと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝T-That's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝T-That's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あなたは、本当に何も女心がわかってませんわね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You really do not understand the heart of a maiden in love...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You really do not understand the heart of a maiden in love...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「でも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝But...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝But...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「なんだか、そういうところが、わたくしは好きになったのかもしれませんわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Maybe that is one of the reasons I am in love with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Maybe that is one of the reasons I am in love with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「悪いのは、わたくしですわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It is all my fault...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It is all my fault...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あの子を置き去りにしたのも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I left him behind...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I left him behind...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あの子を育てたのも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I raised him...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I raised him...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あの子を拾ったのも、全部わたくしですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝And I chose him. I am the one who did all of that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝And I chose him. I am the one who did all of that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「だったら、本当はわたくしひとりがここにいれば、それでいいはずですもの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝So it should suffice for me alone to stay here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝So it should suffice for me alone to stay here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それでも、僕だってここにいたんじゃないか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But he's allowed me to stay here with you all this time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But he's allowed me to stay here with you all this time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「知ってたら見過ごすことなんて僕には出来ない!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Now that I know everything, I just can't pretend to not care!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Now that I know everything, I just can't pretend to not care!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…そうですわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「けど、もしかしたら、それが原因でここは出来てしまったんじゃないかしら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝But I think that might be one of the reasons he created this world...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝But I think that might be one of the reasons he created this world...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ふとした時に、クロのことを思い出しますの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Sometimes I recall Kuro.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Sometimes I recall Kuro.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…きっと死んでしまったんだろう、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝And think he must be already dead.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝And think he must be already dead.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「なぜわたくしは見つけることが出来なかったのか、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝And regret being unable to find him back then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝And regret being unable to find him back then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…ねえ、無責任ですわね、わたくしは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝See how irresponsible I am.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝See how irresponsible I am.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「責任も負えないなら、いっそ見過ごしてしまっていたら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Had I known this would happen, I never would have taken him home.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Had I known this would happen, I never would have taken him home.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんなこと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんなことは絶対無いと思う…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think you're irresponsible...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think you're irresponsible...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「でも、最後くらいわたくしは責任を取りますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝But I have decided to bear the consequences.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝But I have decided to bear the consequences.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝So.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝So.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「さようなら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Good bye.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Good bye.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 界から、離れていく。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm drifting away from that world.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm drifting away from that world.

MESSAGE.JP: う、声は聞こえない。
MESSAGE.EN: I can no longer hear her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can no longer hear her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「笹瀬川さん…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: れていく…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm being pulled away from her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm being pulled away from her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What the hell is this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What the hell is this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「勝手すぎるだろ、そんなのっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How can you be so selfish...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How can you be so selfish...❞

MESSAGE.JP: からないって。
MESSAGE.EN: She said I didn't understand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said I didn't understand.

MESSAGE.JP: の言ってることがわかってもらえないのに、向こうのことなんてわかるはずないじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: How can I understand her when she doesn't understand me either?
MESSAGE.Translation: How can I understand her when she doesn't understand me either?

MESSAGE.JP: り合えないってことばっかり解り合うなんて、そんな諦めた言葉、僕は使いたくない。
MESSAGE.EN: ❜The only thing people can understand about each other is that they cannot understand each other.❜ I never want be the type of guy who'd say something so nihilistic.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❜The only thing people can understand about each other is that they cannot understand each other.❜ I never want be the type of guy who'd say something so nihilistic.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は。
MESSAGE.EN: I just...
MESSAGE.Translation: I just...

MESSAGE.JP: は、この世界の意味を全うしたかったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I just wanted to fulfill the purpose of this world.
MESSAGE.Translation: I just wanted to fulfill the purpose of this world.

MESSAGE.JP: 分がそうしたから。
MESSAGE.EN: Because it was something I had done before.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because it was something I had done before.

MESSAGE.JP: うして、ここにいるから。
MESSAGE.EN: Because I was allowed here.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because I was allowed here.

MESSAGE.JP: れは、無駄なことなんかじゃないって、思ってるから。
MESSAGE.EN: And because I don't believe that this world was created in vain.
MESSAGE.Translation: And because I don't believe that this world was created in vain.

MESSAGE.JP: 悪のことばかり想定したって、そんなのただの後ろ向きでしかないじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: Thinking about the worst case scenarios was just me being exceedingly negative.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thinking about the worst case scenarios was just me being exceedingly negative.

MESSAGE.JP: も、僕の原動力はそんなことだったんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: But are those things really what's been keeping me going?
MESSAGE.Translation: But are those things really what's been keeping me going?

MESSAGE.JP: うだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I too...
MESSAGE.Translation: I too...

MESSAGE.JP: だって、笹瀬川さんが好きだから、ずっとこうしてたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I also liked Sasasegawa-san, and that's why I had been helping her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I also liked Sasasegawa-san, and that's why I had been helping her.

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんが僕を逃がそうとしたって。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if she wants me to escape,
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if she wants me to escape,

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は、笹瀬川さんと一緒にここを出なきゃ、意味がないって思う。
MESSAGE.EN: there would be no point unless both of us could make it out.
MESSAGE.Translation: there would be no point unless both of us could make it out.

MESSAGE.JP: じ理由なのに、考え方もすることも、全然違う。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite having the same reasons, we thought and acted in completely different ways.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite having the same reasons, we thought and acted in completely different ways.

MESSAGE.JP: んなだから、分かり合うってのは、難しいんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why it's hard for people to understand each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why it's hard for people to understand each other.

MESSAGE.JP: も。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet...
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「笹瀬川さんは、僕にそれを伝えてくれたじゃないか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She confessed her feelings to me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She confessed her feelings to me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕はまだ、何も伝えてない…!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I haven't told her anything yet...!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I haven't told her anything yet...!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: から、僕は戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why I must return to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why I must return to her.

MESSAGE.JP: うことなんかない。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't need to hesitate.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't need to hesitate.

MESSAGE.JP: 由は一つあれば、それでいい。
MESSAGE.EN: As long as there was just one reason, that'd be enough.
MESSAGE.Translation: As long as there was just one reason, that'd be enough.

MESSAGE.JP: そんなことじゃない、と思う。
MESSAGE.EN: No, I don't think that was it.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, I don't think that was it.

MESSAGE.JP: そんなことじゃない、と思う。
MESSAGE.EN: No, I don't think that was it.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, I don't think that was it.
