MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやいや。何がよくわからないか説明してくれないと、僕だってよくわからないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, you need to explain what you guys are unsure of, otherwise I'm not sure either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, you need to explain what you guys are unsure of, otherwise I'm not sure either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「こまりちゃんの部屋に家財道具がもう一式揃ってるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝There's a set of furniture in Komari-chan's room that isn't hers.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝There's a set of furniture in Komari-chan's room that isn't hers.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん…誰のなのか、わからないんだけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝That's right... I'm not sure whose it is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝That's right... I'm not sure whose it is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あたしはこまりちゃんが寝ぼけてもうひとり分用意してしまった、と思うんだが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝My theory is that she bought them in her sleep...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝My theory is that she bought them in her sleep...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ふえ？　私寝相はそんなに悪くないよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue? I don't toss around in my sleep that badly～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue? I don't toss around in my sleep that badly～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「じゃあ幽霊の仕業か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Then it was the doing of a ghost?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Then it was the doing of a ghost?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ふええっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fuee!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fuee!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやいやいや…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no, no...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, no...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 想が両極端だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin's ideas were both extreme.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin's ideas were both extreme.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うーん…ゆーれーさんだったとしてもねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hmm... Even if it's a ghost...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hmm... Even if it's a ghost...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「私はそんなに悪いひとじゃなかったと思うんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I don't think she was a bad person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I don't think she was a bad person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ん？　なんでだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hm? Why's that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hm? Why's that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ルームメイトになれるような人なら、きっと仲良くなってたと思うんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝If I could have gotten a chance to be her roommate, I'm sure we would have made good friends.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝If I could have gotten a chance to be her roommate, I'm sure we would have made good friends.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「だって、ずっと一緒にいられたら、それはもうなかよしさんなのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝If you are with someone for a long time, that means you are already very close to them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝If you are with someone for a long time, that means you are already very close to them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…確かにね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「だからね、しばらくあのままにしておこうと思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝So, I'm thinking of letting the furniture stay there for a while.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝So, I'm thinking of letting the furniture stay there for a while.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「だって、また帰ってきたときに、お部屋に何もなくなってたら悲しいよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Because, you know, if she comes back and finds them gone, I'm sure she'll be sad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Because, you know, if she comes back and finds them gone, I'm sure she'll be sad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うーむ…そうか、そうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hmm... I guess you're right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hmm... I guess you're right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「だから、りんちゃんとルームメイトはまた今度にね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝So, I can't be your roommate right now, Rin-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝So, I can't be your roommate right now, Rin-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…こまりちゃんがそういうなら、しょうがないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...If you say so, then I give up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...If you say so, then I give up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん。でもまたりんちゃんの部屋にお泊りに行くよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yeah. But I'm going to go stay over in your room again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yeah. But I'm going to go stay over in your room again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 一つ変わらない毎日だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Nothing has changed here.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nothing has changed here.

MESSAGE.JP: 局、笹瀬川さんはあの世界でどうしてるんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder what Sasasegawa-san was doing in that other world.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder what Sasasegawa-san was doing in that other world.

MESSAGE.JP: そこに残されたものは、ここでは全部忘れられてしまうみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Everything left there seems to have been forgotten here.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everything left there seems to have been forgotten here.

MESSAGE.JP: もいつか、あそこで起こったことを全部、忘れてしまうんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Will I, too, one day forget everything about that world?
MESSAGE.Translation: Will I, too, one day forget everything about that world?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「すみません、ペット用の首輪ってありますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Excuse me, do you have pet collars?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Excuse me, do you have pet collars?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 店員@「はい、こちらです。どのようなサイズをお探しでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Clerk@❝Certainly, right over here. What size are you looking for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Clerk@❝Certainly, right over here. What size are you looking for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えっと、これくらいのちっちゃめな犬と…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, one for a small dog, like this, and...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, one for a small dog, like this, and...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…あと、猫用のって、ありますか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...One for a cat, please.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...One for a cat, please.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ふたつとも、簡単に千切れたりしない、名前とか書けるような…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I want them to be sturdy ones, with name tags on them...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I want them to be sturdy ones, with name tags on them...❞

MESSAGE.JP: んとなく買ったけど。
MESSAGE.EN: I bought those for no particular reason.
MESSAGE.Translation: I bought those for no particular reason.

MESSAGE.JP: これを、どうするっていうんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: What am I going to do with them?
MESSAGE.Translation: What am I going to do with them?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もし、帰ってきたら、これを渡そう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If she ever comes back, I'll give this to her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If she ever comes back, I'll give this to her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れまでは、これを見るたび。
MESSAGE.EN: Until then,
MESSAGE.Translation: Until then,

MESSAGE.JP: んの少しだけ、あの世界のことを思い出そう。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll remember that world every time I see this collar.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll remember that world every time I see this collar.

MESSAGE.JP: うやって、いつまでも待ち続けてみよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll wait for you like this for as long it takes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll wait for you like this for as long it takes.

MESSAGE.JP: もしかしたら、僕は。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe...
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe...

MESSAGE.JP: っぱり、笹瀬川さんのことが好きだったのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: I am in love with Sasasegawa-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I am in love with Sasasegawa-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「遅すぎたかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess it's a little late to realize that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess it's a little late to realize that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: からさ。
MESSAGE.EN: So,
MESSAGE.Translation: So,

MESSAGE.JP: 後悔なんて、これからいくつも重ねて生きていくんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I will continue to relive this regret for the rest of my life...
MESSAGE.Translation: I will continue to relive this regret for the rest of my life...

MESSAGE.JP: 折思い出して、心を痛めながら。
MESSAGE.EN: With a pain in my heart, I will think about you from time to time.
MESSAGE.Translation: With a pain in my heart, I will think about you from time to time.

MESSAGE.JP: ってるよ。
MESSAGE.EN: And I will always be waiting for you.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I will always be waiting for you.

MESSAGE.JP: ずっと。
MESSAGE.EN: Forever...
MESSAGE.Translation: Forever...

MESSAGE.JP: に？
MESSAGE.EN: What else?
MESSAGE.Translation: What else?

MESSAGE.JP: 他に、何があるっていうんだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: What other reason was there?
MESSAGE.Translation: What other reason was there?

MESSAGE.JP: も、僕は戻りたいんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't know, but I just wanted to go back to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't know, but I just wanted to go back to her.

MESSAGE.JP: のこと、言えない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't blame her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't blame her.

MESSAGE.JP: だって矛盾だらけでおかしいことを言っている。
MESSAGE.EN: I also said a lot of contradictory things.
MESSAGE.Translation: I also said a lot of contradictory things.

MESSAGE.JP: 由なんて、言葉にさえ出来ない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't even put this reason of mine into words.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't even put this reason of mine into words.

MESSAGE.JP: んなだから、『わからない』って言うんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I bet that's why she told me I ❛don't understand.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I bet that's why she told me I ❛don't understand.❜

MESSAGE.JP: の猫と、笹瀬川さん。
MESSAGE.EN: That cat and Sasasegawa-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: That cat and Sasasegawa-san.

MESSAGE.JP: と、あの猫。
MESSAGE.EN: Me and that cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Me and that cat.

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんと、僕。
MESSAGE.EN: She and I.
MESSAGE.Translation: She and I.

MESSAGE.JP: んな、わからないことだらけなんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Nobody understands each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nobody understands each other.

MESSAGE.JP: も、そんなわからない世界で、これまで過ごしてきたことが、理由になる気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet, those days I spent with her in that world were a reason in and of themselves.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet, those days I spent with her in that world were a reason in and of themselves.

MESSAGE.JP: っと、笹瀬川さんと過ごしてきた世界。
MESSAGE.EN: That world I lived in with Sasasegawa-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: That world I lived in with Sasasegawa-san.

MESSAGE.JP: あ、なんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah, I just realized.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah, I just realized.

MESSAGE.JP: 単なひとつの理由があった。
MESSAGE.EN: There's one plain and simple reason.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's one plain and simple reason.

MESSAGE.JP: は、また。
MESSAGE.EN: I just wanted to...
MESSAGE.Translation: I just wanted to...

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんに会いたいってことだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I just wanted to see her again...
MESSAGE.Translation: I just wanted to see her again...

MESSAGE.JP: 戻るんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to go back to her...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to go back to her...

MESSAGE.JP: 介が言ってたじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke said
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke said

MESSAGE.JP: の世界は、穴だらけだって。
MESSAGE.EN: that the world is full of holes.
MESSAGE.Translation: that the world is full of holes.

MESSAGE.JP: っと、戻れるところがあるはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: So a way must exist.
MESSAGE.Translation: So a way must exist.

MESSAGE.JP: 意識下で僕は、あの猫とシンクロしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: That cat and I were synchronized on a subconscious level.
MESSAGE.Translation: That cat and I were synchronized on a subconscious level.

MESSAGE.JP: ういう意味では、僕もあの世界を創った『犯人』のひとりなのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: In that sense, you could say I was one of the ❛culprits❜ behind that world's creation.
MESSAGE.Translation: In that sense, you could say I was one of the ❛culprits❜ behind that world's creation.

MESSAGE.JP: って、あの猫と僕は、とてもよく似ていたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Because that cat and I were very similar.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because that cat and I were very similar.

MESSAGE.JP: とうさんと、おかあさんにおいていかれて、独りぼっちになったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: We both lost our parents and were left alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: We both lost our parents and were left alone.

MESSAGE.JP: 失っていた猫の気持ちが、見えてきた気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm starting to see that cat's feelings that I once lost.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm starting to see that cat's feelings that I once lost.

MESSAGE.JP: 塞ぎ込んでいたあの日。
MESSAGE.EN: During those days when I was in deep despair...
MESSAGE.Translation: During those days when I was in deep despair...

MESSAGE.JP: は何を思っていただろう。
MESSAGE.EN: What were my thoughts back then?
MESSAGE.Translation: What were my thoughts back then?

MESSAGE.JP: めや、ほんの一瞬の救いがなんになるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: There is no lasting salvation in any words of comfort.
MESSAGE.Translation: There is no lasting salvation in any words of comfort.

MESSAGE.JP: れど、それがなきゃ、人は生きていけないじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet without those, people cannot live.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet without those, people cannot live.

MESSAGE.JP: う一つの閉じた世界が見えてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: I began to see that closed-off world again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I began to see that closed-off world again.

MESSAGE.JP: 想いだけを残して、ただ待ち続ける世界。
MESSAGE.EN: The world that had been waiting with nothing but feelings left in it.
MESSAGE.Translation: The world that had been waiting with nothing but feelings left in it.

MESSAGE.JP: ごめんなさい。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sorry...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sorry...

MESSAGE.JP: も、僕はもう戻るって決めたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But I made up my mind to go back there.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I made up my mind to go back there.

MESSAGE.JP: う思うと。
MESSAGE.EN: And the moment when I thought that,
MESSAGE.Translation: And the moment when I thought that,

MESSAGE.JP: が見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I could see a door.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could see a door.

MESSAGE.JP: の部屋だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was my room.

MESSAGE.JP: の片隅で、ひざを抱えている少女が一人。
MESSAGE.EN: And in there a girl sat, holding her knees.
MESSAGE.Translation: And in there a girl sat, holding her knees.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「笹瀬川さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…あなた…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ど、どうしてここにいますのっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝W-Why are you here!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝W-Why are you here!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…戻ってきちゃった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well... I came back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well... I came back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「戻ってきちゃった、ですって…!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You... came back!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You... came back!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: を抱えて、はあとため息を吐く。
MESSAGE.EN: She let out a sigh with her head in her arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: She let out a sigh with her head in her arms.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…なんだったんですの、わたくしの決死の告白は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You completely ruined that desperate confession of mine...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You completely ruined that desperate confession of mine...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ご、ごめん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝S-sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝S-sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「謝らなくてもいいですわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝No apologizing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝No apologizing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「謝らなきゃいけないとしたら、わたくしのほうですから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I think it is I who must apologize here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I think it is I who must apologize here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…さすがに僕も、ちょっと怒った」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Exactly... Even I got a little mad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Exactly... Even I got a little mad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、すごくかも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I got quite mad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I got quite mad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、いいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't mind anymore, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't mind anymore, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「お互い様だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Because we're even.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Because we're even.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「お、お互い様って…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝W-What do you mean by ❜we are even❜...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝W-What do you mean by ❜we are even❜...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕だって、その…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I, um...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I, um...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「笹瀬川さんが好きだから、戻ってきたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I came back because I love you too, Sasasegawa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I came back because I love you too, Sasasegawa-san.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、あの、答えたつもりなんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, well, that's my reply to your confession...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, well, that's my reply to your confession...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あなたって人は…本当に女心を何もわかってませんのねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝For heaven's sake... you really do not understand the heart of a maiden!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝For heaven's sake... you really do not understand the heart of a maiden!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ええ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eehh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eehh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「こういうときは、もうちょっとロマンティックに返事をするべきですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You are supposed to make yourself sound more romantic at times like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You are supposed to make yourself sound more romantic at times like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「う…ご、ごめん、そういうの、ちょっとよくわからなくて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ugh... Sorry, I'm not too good at this sort of thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ugh... Sorry, I'm not too good at this sort of thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「いいですの？　こういうときは、もっとこうやって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Let me show you. At times like this, what you must do is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Let me show you. At times like this, what you must do is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんの手を取る形になる。
MESSAGE.EN: I took her hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took her hands.

MESSAGE.JP: いや、取らされてるんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...To be more accurate, she made me do that.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...To be more accurate, she made me do that.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「カッコのいい決め台詞を言いながら、口付けをするものですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Say something cool and kiss me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Say something cool and kiss me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、えぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eehh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eehh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 、格好のいい決め台詞って言われても。
MESSAGE.EN: S-something cool? What in the world am I supposed to say?
MESSAGE.Translation: S-something cool? What in the world am I supposed to say?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、ええぇ…と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, um...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, um...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「もうっ、じれったいですわねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Geez, you can be so irritating!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Geez, you can be so irritating!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「こういうときは、あなたの言葉でいいんですわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Just use your words.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Just use your words.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、えーと…ごめん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well... Sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well... Sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…またそれですの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Not that again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Not that again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だって、僕の言葉だから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Those are my words...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Those are my words...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、僕は最後まで笹瀬川さんと一緒にいる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I promise to stay with you until the end.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I promise to stay with you until the end.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ん、まあいいですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Hm, I give you a passing grade.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Hm, I give you a passing grade.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんが目を閉じる。
MESSAGE.EN: She closed her eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: She closed her eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: は、笹瀬川さんの唇に、唇を合わせて。
MESSAGE.EN: I pressed my lips against hers and...
MESSAGE.Translation: I pressed my lips against hers and...

MESSAGE.JP: スをした。
MESSAGE.EN: We kissed.
MESSAGE.Translation: We kissed.

MESSAGE.JP: んだか、僕じゃ全然ロマンティックになんて出来ないけど。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't do it romantically at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't do it romantically at all.

MESSAGE.JP: 唇が離れる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Our lips parted.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Our lips parted.

MESSAGE.JP: 、笹瀬川さんが、僕の胸に顔を埋める。
MESSAGE.EN: She then buried her face against my chest.
MESSAGE.Translation: She then buried her face against my chest.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…あんなこと言いましたけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...I said such harsh things to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...I said such harsh things to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「戻ってきてくれて、その…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝But actually, um...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝But actually, um...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「う、嬉しかったですわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I-I was glad you came back...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I-I was glad you came back...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ひとりじゃ、やっぱり不安で…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I felt so anxious once I was alone...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I felt so anxious once I was alone...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「何も、出来そうもありませんでしたから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I could not have done anything without you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I could not have done anything without you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: からここで、笹瀬川さんは膝を抱えてたんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: That must have been why she was sitting there like that.
MESSAGE.Translation: That must have been why she was sitting there like that.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「で、でも、その…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝B-But, well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝B-But, well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…あなたがいてくれるなら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝If you stay with me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝If you stay with me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…僕は、ずっと一緒にいるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I'll stay with you forever.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I'll stay with you forever.❞

MESSAGE.JP: らは、あの場所へ向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: We were on our way to that place.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were on our way to that place.

MESSAGE.JP: 然と、手をつないだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Before we knew it, we were naturally holding hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before we knew it, we were naturally holding hands.

MESSAGE.JP: が、笹瀬川さんの手を引くカタチ。
MESSAGE.EN: I was taking her by the hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was taking her by the hand.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりでいるっていう強さは、そういうことだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That's the strength gain from being with someone.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...That's the strength gain from being with someone.

MESSAGE.JP: っちかがためらうなら、どっちかが手を引いてあげればいい。
MESSAGE.EN: If one hesitates, the other takes their hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: If one hesitates, the other takes their hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 静かな世界だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It is so quiet around here.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It is so quiet around here.

MESSAGE.JP: には、風の音だけが聞こえてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: All I could hear was a breeze blowing.
MESSAGE.Translation: All I could hear was a breeze blowing.

MESSAGE.JP: れど、さっきの世界じゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: But this is neither the world we were in a while ago,
MESSAGE.Translation: But this is neither the world we were in a while ago,

MESSAGE.JP: もといた世界でもない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...nor the real world.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...nor the real world.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どこだろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Where am I...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Where am I...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 袖だと、少し暑い。
MESSAGE.EN: It was hot, and I wasn't very comfortable wearing a long-sleeved shirt.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was hot, and I wasn't very comfortable wearing a long-sleeved shirt.

MESSAGE.JP: くに、ピアノの音が聞こえる。
MESSAGE.EN: I could hear the piano playing.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could hear the piano playing.

MESSAGE.JP: を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked up at the sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked up at the sky.

MESSAGE.JP: は、流れない。
MESSAGE.EN: There were no clouds moving up there.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were no clouds moving up there.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ここは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: かがいる世界。
MESSAGE.EN: a world in which there was someone.
MESSAGE.Translation: a world in which there was someone.

MESSAGE.JP: まった時の世界。
MESSAGE.EN: A world where time had stopped passing by.
MESSAGE.Translation: A world where time had stopped passing by.

MESSAGE.JP: こで誰かは、何かを待っている。
MESSAGE.EN: And someone was waiting for something here.
MESSAGE.Translation: And someone was waiting for something here.

MESSAGE.JP: んだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: What was this feeling?
MESSAGE.Translation: What was this feeling?

MESSAGE.JP: は、それを知っている気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt that I knew what it was.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt that I knew what it was.

MESSAGE.JP: にかは、わからない。
MESSAGE.EN: But I couldn't tell exactly what it was.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I couldn't tell exactly what it was.

MESSAGE.JP: からない、とは少し違う。
MESSAGE.EN: No, that's not quite right.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, that's not quite right.

MESSAGE.JP: い出せないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't remember what it was.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't remember what it was.

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、それには、僕は答えることが出来ない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Yet, I knew it was something I could not answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Yet, I knew it was something I could not answer.

MESSAGE.JP: ぜか、それだけわかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I only knew that for some reason.
MESSAGE.Translation: I only knew that for some reason.

MESSAGE.JP: 意に、世界が歪んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The world unexpectedly swerved.
MESSAGE.Translation: The world unexpectedly swerved.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕を送り出してくれるんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Would I make it out of here...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Would I make it out of here...?

MESSAGE.JP: 信はないけど、その先には、さっきの世界があるような気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I didn't have any proof, it felt like the world we were in earlier was what laid ahead of us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I didn't have any proof, it felt like the world we were in earlier was what laid ahead of us.

MESSAGE.JP: んな世界が、いくつあるんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: How many worlds like this could there be?
MESSAGE.Translation: How many worlds like this could there be?

MESSAGE.JP: わなかったもの。叶えられるのを待っているもの。
MESSAGE.EN: Wishes that weren't fulfilled, and wishes that were waiting to be fulfilled.
MESSAGE.Translation: Wishes that weren't fulfilled, and wishes that were waiting to be fulfilled.

MESSAGE.JP: し、それが世界を創るんだったら…。
MESSAGE.EN: If those wishes were what created worlds like this...
MESSAGE.Translation: If those wishes were what created worlds like this...

MESSAGE.JP: の部屋だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was my room.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ここ、繋がってたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, it led me here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, it led me here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 外』と繋がっていた場所。
MESSAGE.EN: This was the place connected to ❛the outside.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: This was the place connected to ❛the outside.❜

MESSAGE.JP: こは他とは違う場所だと思ってたけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was thinking that this was different from all the other places...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was thinking that this was different from all the other places...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ここは、僕の記憶なんだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This place is created by my memories.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This place is created by my memories.❞

MESSAGE.JP: テリアルの無いものは構築できない。
MESSAGE.EN: Nothing could be created without material.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nothing could be created without material.

MESSAGE.JP: れは、誰の言葉だっけ。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder just who had said that?
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder just who had said that?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごめんね…でも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sorry, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sorry, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: い出せない誰かに謝る。
MESSAGE.EN: I apologized to the one who had said it, unable to recall who it was.
MESSAGE.Translation: I apologized to the one who had said it, unable to recall who it was.

MESSAGE.JP: れはきっと、届かないだろうけど。
MESSAGE.EN: This apology of mine probably wouldn't reach them.
MESSAGE.Translation: This apology of mine probably wouldn't reach them.

MESSAGE.JP: とは、この世界でやるべきことはひとつ。
MESSAGE.EN: There was only one thing left that I had to do in this world, though.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was only one thing left that I had to do in this world, though.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…会いに行くよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm coming to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm coming to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: っと、あそこにいる。
MESSAGE.EN: I knew where to go.
MESSAGE.Translation: I knew where to go.

MESSAGE.JP: う、形も成してないくらいの世界だけど。
MESSAGE.EN: The world was losing its form.
MESSAGE.Translation: The world was losing its form.

MESSAGE.JP: にも聞こえない、白い世界にひとり。
MESSAGE.EN: There was someone in this soundless, white world.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was someone in this soundless, white world.

MESSAGE.JP: の、後姿に声を掛ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I called their name from behind them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I called their name from behind them.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「笹瀬川さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: She turned around.
MESSAGE.Translation: She turned around.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…あなた…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ど、どうしてここにいますのっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝W-Why are you here!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝W-Why are you here!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…戻ってきちゃった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um... I just came back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um... I just came back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「戻ってきちゃった、ですって…!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝What do you mean you just came back...!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝What do you mean you just came back...!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: を抱えて、はあとため息を吐く。
MESSAGE.EN: She let out a sigh with her hand raised to her mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: She let out a sigh with her hand raised to her mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「し、信じられませんわ…わたくしの決意を踏みにじるおつもり？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I-I just cannot believe this... Have you no respect for my decision?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I-I just cannot believe this... Have you no respect for my decision?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ご、ごめん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I-I'm sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I-I'm sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、さ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, listen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, listen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「なんですの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝What is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝What is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: い訳をしようとして、ふと思い直す。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to justify my action, but thought it over again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to justify my action, but thought it over again.

MESSAGE.JP: 戻ってきたのなんて、ただ僕がそうしたかったから。
MESSAGE.EN: I returned simply because I wanted to.
MESSAGE.Translation: I returned simply because I wanted to.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I'm so sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I'm so sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「謝らなくてもいいですわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You do not need to apologize.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You do not need to apologize.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「謝らなきゃいけないとしたら、わたくしのほうですから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I imagine I am the one who owes you an apology...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I imagine I am the one who owes you an apology...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、僕も僕のワガママで戻ってきちゃったから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I came back here out of my own selfishness...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I came back here out of my own selfishness...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…怒ってる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Are you mad?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Are you mad?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「お、怒ってなんて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝O-Of course not...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝O-Of course not...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ただ、その…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I am just...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I am just...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…その」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...Um.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...Um.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ちょっぴり、その…嬉しかった、ような…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Just a little bit... I was glad...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Just a little bit... I was glad...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「うん、じゃないですわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Do not just ❜huh❜ me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Do not just ❜huh❜ me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「や、やっぱり怒ってるじゃない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Y-You're mad after all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Y-You're mad after all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: んず、とほっぺをつままれる。
MESSAGE.EN: She pinched my cheeks hard.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pinched my cheeks hard.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「う・れ・し・かっ・たって言ってますのよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I. Said. I. Was. Glad!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I. Said. I. Was. Glad!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ひ、ひはいって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝T-That shurts...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝T-That shurts...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…だって、結局…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Because I am quite certain...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Because I am quite certain...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「わたくしには何も出来そうもありませんのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I will end up unable to do anything on my own.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I will end up unable to do anything on my own.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う一度、壁の周りを調べてみた。
MESSAGE.EN: I investigated around the wall once more.
MESSAGE.Translation: I investigated around the wall once more.

MESSAGE.JP: の壁は、拒絶の壁。
MESSAGE.EN: This was a wall of rejection.
MESSAGE.Translation: This was a wall of rejection.

MESSAGE.JP: こに抜け道はないみたいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: There seemed to be no way through it.
MESSAGE.Translation: There seemed to be no way through it.

MESSAGE.JP: の猫は、この世界のマスターのはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That cat must be the master of this world.
MESSAGE.Translation: That cat must be the master of this world.

MESSAGE.JP: こんな壁も排除できないくらい、その力が弱まっているってことだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...And he'd become too weak to remove a wall like this.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And he'd become too weak to remove a wall like this.

MESSAGE.JP: ったら、この壁を壊すことが出来るのは、ひとりしかいない。
MESSAGE.EN: In the case, there was only one person who could do it in his stead.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the case, there was only one person who could do it in his stead.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「笹瀬川さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「なんですの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝What is it...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝What is it...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…壁に、触れてみて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Touch the wall.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Touch the wall.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「で、でも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝B-But...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝B-But...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「笹瀬川さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…あの猫はきっと、笹瀬川さんを恨んでなんかいないと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I don't think that cat hates you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I don't think that cat hates you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「そ、そんなの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝T-That's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝T-That's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「どうして、あなたにわかるんですの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝How can you tell?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝How can you tell?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…わたくしが、馬鹿なせいで、あの子は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...Since I was such an idiot, he...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...Since I was such an idiot, he...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can tell because...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can tell because...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕が、そうだったから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We are similar...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We are similar...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I mean.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I mean.

MESSAGE.JP: とあの猫が、とても似てたから。
MESSAGE.EN: He and I went through a similar situation.
MESSAGE.Translation: He and I went through a similar situation.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「お父さんも、お母さんも、僕を置いて逝っちゃったけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝My mom and dad passed away and left me behind...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝My mom and dad passed away and left me behind...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕は、運命を呪った事もあったけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And I once cursed that fate of mine...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And I once cursed that fate of mine...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でもさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「こんな世界を創れるなら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If I, too, could create a world like this,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If I, too, could create a world like this,❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ただ、また会いたいって、そう思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I would create one to see them again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I would create one to see them again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「仕方がないなんて割り切りたくないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's still hard for me to accept their deaths...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's still hard for me to accept their deaths...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕は、きっとそうだと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I think I would probably do so nevertheless.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I think I would probably do so nevertheless.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…幸せな時間をくれた人たちだったら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If it's someone who brought you happiness...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If it's someone who brought you happiness...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「きっと、また会いたいって、そう思う…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You would want to see them again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You would want to see them again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「笹瀬川さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…自分を、責めないで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You must stop blaming yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You must stop blaming yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんは、ためらいながら壁に手を当てる。
MESSAGE.EN: With hesitation, Sasasegawa-san started to reach her hand toward the wall.
MESSAGE.Translation: With hesitation, Sasasegawa-san started to reach her hand toward the wall.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「この壁は、笹瀬川さんの拒絶の壁なんだと思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I reckon this wall was created by your rejection.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I reckon this wall was created by your rejection.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ここまで、来たんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...We have come this far.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...We have come this far.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「耳を澄ませてみて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Listen carefully.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Listen carefully.❞

MESSAGE.JP: が聞いた言葉。
MESSAGE.EN: The words that I'd heard.
MESSAGE.Translation: The words that I'd heard.

MESSAGE.JP: あの猫から、伝えられた言葉。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The words I had heard from the cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The words I had heard from the cat.

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんにも伝わるなら、それで何かが変わる気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: If Sasasegawa-san got to hear them as well, something would change.
MESSAGE.Translation: If Sasasegawa-san got to hear them as well, something would change.

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんが、目を閉じる。
MESSAGE.EN: She closed her eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: She closed her eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: そして。
MESSAGE.EN: And then...
MESSAGE.Translation: And then...

MESSAGE.JP: んだんと、壁が薄くなっていくのを感じた。
MESSAGE.EN: I sensed the wall beginning to shrink.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sensed the wall beginning to shrink.

MESSAGE.JP: あの時僕に届いた言葉と、同じもの。
MESSAGE.EN: She was receiving the same thing I'd received before.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was receiving the same thing I'd received before.

MESSAGE.JP: …クロ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Kuro...❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Kuro...❜

MESSAGE.JP: クロ…？』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Kuro...?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Kuro...?❜

MESSAGE.JP: どこですの？』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Where are you?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Where are you?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『まったく…どこへ行ってしまいましたの？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❛Good grief... Where has he gone?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❛Good grief... Where has he gone?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『いつもいつも、心配ばっかりかけて…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❛He brings me nothing but worry...❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❛He brings me nothing but worry...❜

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『クロっ、どこへ行きましたのっ!?』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❛Kuro, where are you!?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❛Kuro, where are you!?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『クロ…!!』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❛Kuro...!!❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❛Kuro...!!❜

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『クロっ!!　どこですの…!!』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❛Kuro!! Where are you...!!❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❛Kuro!! Where are you...!!❜

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『いない…ひょっとして、外に逃げてしまったんじゃ…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❛I cannot find him... Has he gotten outside..?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❛I cannot find him... Has he gotten outside..?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 黒猫@『にゃ～…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❛Meow...❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❛Meow...❜

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『クロ…!!　さ、探しましたのよっ!!』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❛Kuro...!! I-I have been looking for you!!❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❛Kuro...!! I-I have been looking for you!!❜

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『ま、まったくもう…本当に、心配ばっかりかけて…!!』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❛For crying out loud... I was really really worried about you...!!❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❛For crying out loud... I was really really worried about you...!!❜

MESSAGE.JP: 黒猫@『に～』
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❛Meew～.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❛Meew～.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『に～じゃないですわっ。どれだけ探したと思ってますのっ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❛You think you can meew me!? You have no idea how long I have been looking!❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❛You think you can meew me!? You have no idea how long I have been looking!❜

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『…でも、無事でよかったですわ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❛But I am so glad you are safe...❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❛But I am so glad you are safe...❜

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『いいですこと？　わたくしが探してるときは、きちんと返事をなさい』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❛Listen carefully, okay? You have to answer me properly when I am looking for you, all right?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❛Listen carefully, okay? You have to answer me properly when I am looking for you, all right?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『ほら、こうやって…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❛See, like this...❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❛See, like this...❜

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『…大好きな、ママを呼ぶ言葉ですわよ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❛...These are the words that will bring Mama to you.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❛...These are the words that will bring Mama to you.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 黒猫@『に～』
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❛Meew～.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❛Meew～.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『に～じゃないですわよ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❛Stop meewing me.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❛Stop meewing me.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Ah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Ah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「わたくしの言葉…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Those words that I told him...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Those words that I told him...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あの子…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝He...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝He...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ずっと…ずっと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝He remembers them...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝He remembers them...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「覚えていたんですわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝He remembered them all along...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝He remembered them all along...❞

MESSAGE.JP: やっと、伝わった。
MESSAGE.EN: Finally, they had been delivered...
MESSAGE.Translation: Finally, they had been delivered...

MESSAGE.JP: い冬を越えて。
MESSAGE.EN: A severe winter ended.
MESSAGE.Translation: A severe winter ended.

MESSAGE.JP: が来て。
MESSAGE.EN: A spring came.
MESSAGE.Translation: A spring came.

MESSAGE.JP: が、秋が過ぎて。
MESSAGE.EN: A summer and autumn passed.
MESSAGE.Translation: A summer and autumn passed.

MESSAGE.JP: た、冬になって。
MESSAGE.EN: And another winter arrived.
MESSAGE.Translation: And another winter arrived.

MESSAGE.JP: れを、幾度となく繰り返す。
MESSAGE.EN: Those were repeated over and over again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Those were repeated over and over again.

MESSAGE.JP: んな長い時間を越えて。
MESSAGE.EN: After all these years,
MESSAGE.Translation: After all these years,

MESSAGE.JP: やっと、伝わったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: she finally heard it.
MESSAGE.Translation: she finally heard it.

MESSAGE.JP: して…。
MESSAGE.EN: And then...
MESSAGE.Translation: And then...

MESSAGE.JP: つの想いを隔てていた壁が、消え去っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: The wall between them began to collapse.
MESSAGE.Translation: The wall between them began to collapse.

MESSAGE.JP: して、笹瀬川さんは、その向こうへ歩き出した。
MESSAGE.EN: She was walking over there.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was walking over there.

MESSAGE.JP: も、その後についていく。
MESSAGE.EN: I followed her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I followed her.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…クロ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...Kuro.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...Kuro.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…どこですの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...Where are you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...Where are you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゃあ、と一つ、短い声。
MESSAGE.EN: A short meow answered.
MESSAGE.Translation: A short meow answered.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…そこでしたのね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...There you are.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...There you are.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「どれだけ、探してましたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝How long have you been looking for me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝How long have you been looking for me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんが、クロに手を伸ばす。
MESSAGE.EN: She held out her hand toward him.
MESSAGE.Translation: She held out her hand toward him.

MESSAGE.JP: ロはよろよろと立ち上がり。
MESSAGE.EN: He stood up, his legs wobbling.
MESSAGE.Translation: He stood up, his legs wobbling.

MESSAGE.JP: っくりと…。
MESSAGE.EN: And slowly...
MESSAGE.Translation: And slowly...

MESSAGE.JP: 当に、ゆっくりと、歩み寄って…。
MESSAGE.EN: Agonizingly slowly, he walked up to her...
MESSAGE.Translation: Agonizingly slowly, he walked up to her...

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんの手に、首をすり寄せた。
MESSAGE.EN: and rubbed his neck on her hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: and rubbed his neck on her hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ごめんなさい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「わたくしは、途中であなたを探すことを、あきらめてしまいましたの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I gave up on finding you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I gave up on finding you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「こんな馬鹿なわたくしを…許してくださいますの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Can you forgive... someone as stupid as me...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Can you forgive... someone as stupid as me...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ロは、また声を上げて。
MESSAGE.EN: Kuro cried once again
MESSAGE.Translation: Kuro cried once again

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんの指を、ぺろ、と舐める。
MESSAGE.EN: and licked her finger.
MESSAGE.Translation: and licked her finger.

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんは、クロをもう一度ぎゅっと抱きしめた。
MESSAGE.EN: She gave him another tight hug.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gave him another tight hug.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ごめんなさい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝So sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝So sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「こんなに、ぼろぼろになって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Look at how worn out you are...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Look at how worn out you are...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「それでも、わたくしを…!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Despite that, you did not stop looking for me...!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Despite that, you did not stop looking for me...!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クロは、一体今、何を言いたいだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder what it was that Kuro wanted to tell her?
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder what it was that Kuro wanted to tell her?

MESSAGE.JP: 葉が通じないって、もどかしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Being that they can't use words, it's frustrating at times.
MESSAGE.Translation: Being that they can't use words, it's frustrating at times.

MESSAGE.JP: でも。
MESSAGE.EN: But nonetheless...
MESSAGE.Translation: But nonetheless...

MESSAGE.JP: つだけは、確かだ。
MESSAGE.EN: One thing was obvious.
MESSAGE.Translation: One thing was obvious.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クロは、さ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sure...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sure...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「きっと、笹瀬川さんのこと、恨んでなんかいなかったんだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kuro never hated you at all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kuro never hated you at all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「わたくしは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「わたくしだけが、本当に馬鹿でしたの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I was the real idiot this whole time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I was the real idiot this whole time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: が伝う笹瀬川さんの頬を、クロがまた舐める。
MESSAGE.EN: Kuro licked a tear running down Sasasegawa-san's cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kuro licked a tear running down Sasasegawa-san's cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…泣かないで、ってさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...He says he doesn't want you to cry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...He says he doesn't want you to cry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「そ、そんなの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝T-That is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝T-That is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あなたは、本当に…いつだってわたくしを困らせてばっかりですわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You... really make me worried all the time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You... really make me worried all the time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: だこれだけの、簡単なこと。
MESSAGE.EN: It really was something this easy.
MESSAGE.Translation: It really was something this easy.

MESSAGE.JP: なのに、どうしてみんな遠回りしてしまうんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Knowing that, why does everybody take the long way around?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Knowing that, why does everybody take the long way around?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（言葉が通じないから？）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Because they can't communicate with words?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Because they can't communicate with words?)

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（…いや）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...No.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...No.)

MESSAGE.JP: 葉があったって、通じないものもある。
MESSAGE.EN: There are things that even words cannot convey.
MESSAGE.Translation: There are things that even words cannot convey.

MESSAGE.JP: れに。
MESSAGE.EN: And besides,
MESSAGE.Translation: And besides,

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…わたくしと遊びたいんですの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...You want to play with me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...You want to play with me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「そうですわね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝All right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝All right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「昔みたいに、一緒に、遊びましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Let us play together like we used to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Let us play together like we used to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉がなくったって、通じるものだってある。
MESSAGE.EN: There are things that can be conveyed without words.
MESSAGE.Translation: There are things that can be conveyed without words.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「でも、もうここは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝But this place is no longer...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝But this place is no longer...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「寮の、僕の部屋に行こう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We can use my dorm room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We can use my dorm room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そこなら、きっと最後まで大丈夫だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We should be fine in there until the end.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We should be fine in there until the end.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…ええ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 本当に、上手くいかないことばかりなんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...There are a lot of things out there that just don't turn out well.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...There are a lot of things out there that just don't turn out well.

MESSAGE.JP: ど、さ。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet,
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet,

MESSAGE.JP: 後の最後に、こんなご褒美くらい、あったっていいと思うんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: who can fault them a reward like this at the end?
MESSAGE.Translation: who can fault them a reward like this at the end?

MESSAGE.JP: れが、この世界の意味なんだから。
MESSAGE.EN: That's what this world is for.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's what this world is for.

MESSAGE.JP: イメージが、形になる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The image was taking further shape.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The image was taking further shape.

MESSAGE.JP: れは、一番幸せだったころ。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure those few moments were the happiest ones he ever had.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure those few moments were the happiest ones he ever had.

MESSAGE.JP: のころが、もう一度だけ、形になる。
MESSAGE.EN: That period of time is now taking shape once more and for the last time.
MESSAGE.Translation: That period of time is now taking shape once more and for the last time.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「何か、ごはんはないかしら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Do we have anything to feed him?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Do we have anything to feed him?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「モンペチがあるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I've got some Mon Petit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I've got some Mon Petit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…すごく、いいやつ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...It's really good stuff.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...It's really good stuff.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「じゃあ、それを用意してくださいます？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝All right then, could you fetch it here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝All right then, could you fetch it here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…あなたのモンペチ好きがようやく役に立ちましたわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...I guess your penchant for Mon Petit is finally coming in handy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...I guess your penchant for Mon Petit is finally coming in handy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちーかまくらいしかないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I only have fish sausages...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I only have fish sausages...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「仕方ないですわね…じゃあ、それでかまいませんわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It seems there is no other choice... All right then, could you bring them here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It seems there is no other choice... All right then, could you bring them here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 意してあげると、クロはそれをむしゃむしゃと食べていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kuro gobbled down the food.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kuro gobbled down the food.

MESSAGE.JP: ても、美味しそうに。
MESSAGE.EN: He appeared to be really enjoying it.
MESSAGE.Translation: He appeared to be really enjoying it.

MESSAGE.JP: べ終わったあと、クロは笹瀬川さんにじゃれつき始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: After the meal, he started playing with Sasasegawa-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: After the meal, he started playing with Sasasegawa-san.

MESSAGE.JP: だまりの窓辺。
MESSAGE.EN: At a sunny window,
MESSAGE.Translation: At a sunny window,

MESSAGE.JP: だ小さいクロ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kuro, who was still small
MESSAGE.Translation: Kuro, who was still small

MESSAGE.JP: だ幼い笹瀬川さん。
MESSAGE.EN: together with Sasasegawa-san, who was still a kid.
MESSAGE.Translation: together with Sasasegawa-san, who was still a kid.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな、イメージ。
MESSAGE.EN: I could picture that scene.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could picture that scene.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ここは温かいですわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It's warm here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It's warm here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クロ@「みゃ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kuro@❝Meow～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kuro@❝Meow～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ええ。ママと一緒に、遊びましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Sure, you can play with Mama here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Sure, you can play with Mama here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何か、遊び道具はいる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you want any toys or anything?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you want any toys or anything?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「いいえ。いつも、手だけで遊んでましたもの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝No, thank you. We always played with our hands.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝No, thank you. We always played with our hands.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ほら、くるくるくる～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Here, *roll*roll*～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Here, *roll*roll*～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんの手にじゃれつくクロ。
MESSAGE.EN: They started playing.
MESSAGE.Translation: They started playing.

MESSAGE.JP: し、ぱし。
MESSAGE.EN: *Swish*swish*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Swish*swish*.

MESSAGE.JP: ロは、その指先を前足ではさもうとする。
MESSAGE.EN: Kuro was trying to catch her finger with his forepaws.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kuro was trying to catch her finger with his forepaws.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ふふっ…ぴしぴしっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Fufu... *Poke*poke*.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Fufu... *Poke*poke*.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あら、つかまってしまいましたわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Oh my, you caught it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Oh my, you caught it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ほら、あむしたらめーですのよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Oh, you cannot eat it, okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Oh, you cannot eat it, okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「はい、もう一回、くるくる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Let us do this again. *Roll*roll*.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Let us do this again. *Roll*roll*.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んな、他愛のない遊びを。
MESSAGE.EN: The game they were playing didn't seem all that special.
MESSAGE.Translation: The game they were playing didn't seem all that special.

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんとクロは、続けていた。
MESSAGE.EN: But they kept doing it.
MESSAGE.Translation: But they kept doing it.

MESSAGE.JP: の世界の、最後まで。
MESSAGE.EN: Until the last moment of this world.
MESSAGE.Translation: Until the last moment of this world.

MESSAGE.JP: うしても、この世界は、終わってしまうから。
MESSAGE.EN: No matter what, it will end.
MESSAGE.Translation: No matter what, it will end.

MESSAGE.JP: も、それまで、ずっとずっと…。
MESSAGE.EN: But until it happens, as long as they can...
MESSAGE.Translation: But until it happens, as long as they can...

MESSAGE.JP: んだん、クロの動きが鈍くなってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kuro was gradually slowing down.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kuro was gradually slowing down.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…疲れてしまったのかしら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...Could he be tired?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...Could he be tired?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Guess so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Guess so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 々しく手を振るクロ。
MESSAGE.EN: He feebly swung his forepaw.
MESSAGE.Translation: He feebly swung his forepaw.

MESSAGE.JP: ずっとずっと、待ち焦がれていたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He had been waiting for this moment to come.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He had been waiting for this moment to come.

MESSAGE.JP: っと、いつまでだって、こうしていたいんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: He must have always wanted to do this.
MESSAGE.Translation: He must have always wanted to do this.

MESSAGE.JP: れど、だんだんと体が支えきれなくなってきて。
MESSAGE.EN: But at this point, he could barely even keep himself standing.
MESSAGE.Translation: But at this point, he could barely even keep himself standing.

MESSAGE.JP: れでも、懸命に飛びつこうとして…。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite that, he was desperately trying to jump at Sasasegawa-san...
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite that, he was desperately trying to jump at Sasasegawa-san...

MESSAGE.JP: んでは、何度も何度も…。
MESSAGE.EN: He tripped over and got up, over and over again...
MESSAGE.Translation: He tripped over and got up, over and over again...

MESSAGE.JP: 々しい体で、懸命に、最後の時を過ごそうと。
MESSAGE.EN: In spite of his worn-out body, he was doing everything he could to truly enjoy those final moments.
MESSAGE.Translation: In spite of his worn-out body, he was doing everything he could to truly enjoy those final moments.

MESSAGE.JP: 大好きなママと、これ以上ないくらいに、幸せな時間を。
MESSAGE.EN: ...To make his final moments with his Mama happier than all those before them.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...To make his final moments with his Mama happier than all those before them.

MESSAGE.JP: っと、クロにとって、この時間がすべての幸せな時間。
MESSAGE.EN: Perhaps to him, these were the happiest moments of his life.
MESSAGE.Translation: Perhaps to him, these were the happiest moments of his life.

MESSAGE.JP: っとこの時を夢みて…。
MESSAGE.EN: He'd dreamt of this day...
MESSAGE.Translation: He'd dreamt of this day...

MESSAGE.JP: の世界でこうして叶って…。
MESSAGE.EN: And the dream came true in this world...
MESSAGE.Translation: And the dream came true in this world...

MESSAGE.JP: 当に、どうして夢は覚めてしまうんだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Really, why is it that dreams have to end?
MESSAGE.Translation: Really, why is it that dreams have to end?

MESSAGE.JP: だって、いつまででもこの光景を眺めていてもかまわない。
MESSAGE.EN: I wouldn't mind watching them doing this for eternity.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wouldn't mind watching them doing this for eternity.

MESSAGE.JP: んの一瞬の時。
MESSAGE.EN: This short period of time.
MESSAGE.Translation: This short period of time.

MESSAGE.JP: り取れば、本当にささやかな一瞬。
MESSAGE.EN: A tiny, little isolated moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: A tiny, little isolated moment.

MESSAGE.JP: の一瞬が、いつまでも続くなら…。
MESSAGE.EN: If only that moment could have lasted forever...
MESSAGE.Translation: If only that moment could have lasted forever...

MESSAGE.JP: も、クロにはもう時間が残っていないんだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: However, Kuro didn't seem to have much time left...
MESSAGE.Translation: However, Kuro didn't seem to have much time left...

MESSAGE.JP: れがわかっているから、笹瀬川さんも、ずっと同じように、あやし続けていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasasegawa-san knew that as well, and kept playing with him the same as she had since the start.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san knew that as well, and kept playing with him the same as she had since the start.

MESSAGE.JP: をかざす。
MESSAGE.EN: She held out her hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She held out her hand.

MESSAGE.JP: ロが飛びつく。
MESSAGE.EN: And he jumped to catch it.
MESSAGE.Translation: And he jumped to catch it.

MESSAGE.JP: かまえて、じゃれつく。
MESSAGE.EN: Once he grabbed hold of it, he toyed with it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Once he grabbed hold of it, he toyed with it.

MESSAGE.JP: ろ足が、崩れる。
MESSAGE.EN: Then his hind legs fell.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then his hind legs fell.

MESSAGE.JP: それでも、クロが遊びたいって言うから。
MESSAGE.EN: Even so, since he wanted to keep playing,
MESSAGE.Translation: Even so, since he wanted to keep playing,

MESSAGE.JP: ってる時間が、ほんの少しだから。
MESSAGE.EN: and because there was so little time left for him,
MESSAGE.Translation: and because there was so little time left for him,

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんは、ずっと同じように…。
MESSAGE.EN: she kept playing with him...
MESSAGE.Translation: she kept playing with him...

MESSAGE.JP: うして、とうとうクロは立ち上がれなくなった。
MESSAGE.EN: At the end, when he was unable to raise himself back up...
MESSAGE.Translation: At the end, when he was unable to raise himself back up...

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…クロ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...Kuro.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...Kuro.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「そろそろ、おねむの時間じゃありませんの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It is time for you to sleep now, I suppose.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It is time for you to sleep now, I suppose.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんは、そのクロの体を抱き上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: She gathered his body up in her arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gathered his body up in her arms.

MESSAGE.JP: たえたのは、陽だまりの一番暖かい場所。
MESSAGE.EN: And she placed him onto the warmest place in the sun.
MESSAGE.Translation: And she placed him onto the warmest place in the sun.

MESSAGE.JP: うして、
MESSAGE.EN: And eventually,
MESSAGE.Translation: And eventually,

MESSAGE.JP: わりが来る。
MESSAGE.EN: when the end was about to arrive...
MESSAGE.Translation: when the end was about to arrive...

MESSAGE.JP: 息を立て始めるクロ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kuro's breathing slowed into a sleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kuro's breathing slowed into a sleep.

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんは、その首筋を指先で撫でる。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasasegawa-san was stroking around his neck with her finger.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san was stroking around his neck with her finger.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…ここが一番撫でられるの、好きでしたわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...I remember you like it best when I rub here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...I remember you like it best when I rub here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ロが、その指を鼻で追って、ぺろりとなめた。
MESSAGE.EN: He trailed her finger with his nose and then licked it.
MESSAGE.Translation: He trailed her finger with his nose and then licked it.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…もう、お別れですのね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...It seems to be time for us to part.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...It seems to be time for us to part.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ばいばい、クロ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Good-bye, Kuro.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Good-bye, Kuro.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 後に、声が聞こえた気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: At that very last moment, it seemed like I heard a voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: At that very last moment, it seemed like I heard a voice.

MESSAGE.JP: それは、たったの一言。
MESSAGE.EN: ...And the voice said just one thing:
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And the voice said just one thing:

MESSAGE.JP: が、来た。
MESSAGE.EN: Morning came.
MESSAGE.Translation: Morning came.

MESSAGE.JP: つもの朝。
MESSAGE.EN: It was as good as any other.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was as good as any other.

MESSAGE.JP: ど、いつもよりは、少し早い。
MESSAGE.EN: But I got out of bed a bit earlier.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I got out of bed a bit earlier.

MESSAGE.JP: は真人を起こさないように着替えて、外に出る。
MESSAGE.EN: I changed as quietly as I could so as not to wake Masato up, and left the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I changed as quietly as I could so as not to wake Masato up, and left the room.

MESSAGE.JP: 庭で走り回る、見知った姿を見かけた。
MESSAGE.EN: As I arrived in the courtyard, I came upon someone familiar.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I arrived in the courtyard, I came upon someone familiar.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「おはよう、ストレルカ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Morning, Strelka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Morning, Strelka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ン、と元気よく答えてくれる。
MESSAGE.EN: She greeted me with an energetic woof.
MESSAGE.Translation: She greeted me with an energetic woof.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ご主人様は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Where's your master?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Where's your master?❞

MESSAGE.JP: た元気のいい声を上げて、とことこと歩き出す。
MESSAGE.EN: With another dynamic woof, she began walking.
MESSAGE.Translation: With another dynamic woof, she began walking.

MESSAGE.JP: はそれについていく。
MESSAGE.EN: I followed after her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I followed after her.

MESSAGE.JP: トレルカとは別の、もっと高い声が聞こえた。
MESSAGE.EN: A bit later, I heard a bark higher than Strelka's.
MESSAGE.Translation: A bit later, I heard a bark higher than Strelka's.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「もー、ヴェルカ、じっとしてないとダメですよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Geez, Belka, you have to keep still!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Geez, Belka, you have to keep still!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい、びしっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Now sit!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Now sit!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ァウー、と鳴いてから、おとなしくクドの前に座る。
MESSAGE.EN: After a woof, she obediently sat down before Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: After a woof, she obediently sat down before Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい、いいこいいこなのです～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Good girl, good girl.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Good girl, good girl.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…賢いですのね。この子は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝She's so smart.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝She's so smart.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「でもやんちゃで困りますー。ほら、動いちゃダメですよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝She's a wild one, though. Hey, stay still.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝She's a wild one, though. Hey, stay still.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「笹瀬川さん、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hi, Kud and Sasasegawa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hi, Kud and Sasasegawa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: を掛ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I spoke up to the girls.
MESSAGE.Translation: I spoke up to the girls.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あ、リキ。ぐっどもーにんぐですー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Oh, Riki. Guddo mo-ningu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Oh, Riki. Guddo mo-ningu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「おはよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「今日は早いんですねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You're up early today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You're up early today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、ちょっとね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…おはようございます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Good morning...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Good morning...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、おはよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ストレルカも、こっちですよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Strelka, you come over here, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Strelka, you come over here, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ン。
MESSAGE.EN: Woof!
MESSAGE.Translation: Woof!

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「もし、今度動物を飼うなら…犬がいいかもしれませんわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝If I ever get the chance to have a pet again... a dog would be nice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝If I ever get the chance to have a pet again... a dog would be nice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「呼んだら、戻ってくる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝A dog will come back when you call for him...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝A dog will come back when you call for him...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「こんど、ですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「さささささーさんは、何かペットさんがいたんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Sasasasasaa-san, have you ever had a pet?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Sasasasasaa-san, have you ever had a pet?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…ええ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Yes...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Yes...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「黒猫、だよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A black cat, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A black cat, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんは僕を見て、ちょっと驚いた顔をして。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked at me with a surprised face.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked at me with a surprised face.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…ええ、そうですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Yes, that is right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Yes, that is right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なずいた。
MESSAGE.EN: She then gave a nod.
MESSAGE.Translation: She then gave a nod.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうですかー。猫さんも可愛いのですが、犬さんもとっても可愛いですよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I see. Cats are cute, although dogs really are cute as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I see. Cats are cute, although dogs really are cute as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ほらー、ヴェルカ、わふわふ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Come on, Belka, wafu-wafu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Come on, Belka, wafu-wafu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「…本当に、可愛いですわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝She is indeed adorable.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝She is indeed adorable.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 校舎裏。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Behind the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Behind the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: 却炉の片隅。
MESSAGE.EN: By the incinerator.
MESSAGE.Translation: By the incinerator.

MESSAGE.JP: き出しの地面の上で。
MESSAGE.EN: On the barren ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: On the barren ground.

MESSAGE.JP: ロは、もうとっくに冷たくなっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kuro lay there, cold.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kuro lay there, cold.

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんは、ただ無言で、その亡骸を抱き上げて。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasasegawa-san silently took up his dead body.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san silently took up his dead body.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕も、何も言わなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't speak, either.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't speak, either.

MESSAGE.JP: って、何を言っていいかわからなかったから。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't find the right words to say.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't find the right words to say.

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんは、強いような、けれどすぐ泣き出しそうな、そんな表情だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite having a stern expression on her face, it also looked like she could start crying at any moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite having a stern expression on her face, it also looked like she could start crying at any moment.

MESSAGE.JP: れは、もう誰にもどうしようもなかったこと。
MESSAGE.EN: This thing was beyond anyone's control.
MESSAGE.Translation: This thing was beyond anyone's control.

MESSAGE.JP: だから、僕もどうしようもなくて、ただ黙っていた…。
MESSAGE.EN: And that was why I stayed silent, not knowing what to do.
MESSAGE.Translation: And that was why I stayed silent, not knowing what to do.

MESSAGE.JP: 墓を掘るために、用務員さんにスコップを借りに行くことにした。
MESSAGE.EN: A few seconds later, though, I thought of borrowing a shovel to dig a grave for Kuro.
MESSAGE.Translation: A few seconds later, though, I thought of borrowing a shovel to dig a grave for Kuro.

MESSAGE.JP: 用務員@「あぁ…スコップだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Janitor@❝Ah... You need a shovel, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Janitor@❝Ah... You need a shovel, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんの抱えるクロを見て、用務員さんは優しい声で答えてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: After one look at Kuro in Sasasegawa-san's arms, the janitor answered us in a kind voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: After one look at Kuro in Sasasegawa-san's arms, the janitor answered us in a kind voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 用務員@「…どら、おじさんが穴を掘ってあげようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Janitor@❝All right then, let me do the digging.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Janitor@❝All right then, let me do the digging.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ありがとうございます。でも、わたくしが自分でやりますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Thank you, but I would like to do it myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Thank you, but I would like to do it myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 用務員@「そうかい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Janitor@❝Is that so?...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Janitor@❝Is that so?...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 用務員@「じゃ、いい場所を教えてあげよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Janitor@❝In that case, the perfect place.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Janitor@❝In that case, the perfect place.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 用務員@「日当たりがよくて、人目もない、猫が好きそうな場所だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Janitor@❝It's out of the way, but gets a lot of sunshine. A cat would love it there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Janitor@❝It's out of the way, but gets a lot of sunshine. A cat would love it there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: えてもらったのは、あの焼却炉のすぐ近く。
MESSAGE.EN: That place was near the incinerator.
MESSAGE.Translation: That place was near the incinerator.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ここならきっと、喜びますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I am sure he would like it here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I am sure he would like it here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「この子は、陽だまりが大好きでしたから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝He did love sunny spots.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝He did love sunny spots.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 端に咲いていた、綺麗な花を捧げる。
MESSAGE.EN: We arranged the beautiful flowers we'd picked up.
MESSAGE.Translation: We arranged the beautiful flowers we'd picked up.

MESSAGE.JP: てるのは、木の墓標。
MESSAGE.EN: And we set up a wooden grave marker that we'd made.
MESSAGE.Translation: And we set up a wooden grave marker that we'd made.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「名前、どうしようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What should we do about the name?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What should we do about the name?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「それは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Well, that's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Well, that's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…書いてやってくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Will you write it for him?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Will you write it for him?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: に振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned to face the owner of the voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned to face the owner of the voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「飼い主の手で、書いてやってくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝His owner should be the one to write it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝His owner should be the one to write it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 性のマジックを笹瀬川さんに手渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: He handed her a permanent marker.
MESSAGE.Translation: He handed her a permanent marker.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介…なんで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke... What brought you here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke... What brought you here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「さあな…なぜだかは俺にもわからない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No idea... I don't even know myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No idea... I don't even know myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ただ、ここへきて言わなきゃいけない気がした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But something told me that I had to come here and tell you something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But something told me that I had to come here and tell you something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「すまなかった、と。それと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm here to tell that cat I'm sorry, and...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm here to tell that cat I'm sorry, and...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「よかったな、って言ってやるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝We're happy for him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝We're happy for him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「その子の本当のお願いが叶ったんだからね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Because his deepest wish came true...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Because his deepest wish came true...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介の後ろから、ふたりが。
MESSAGE.EN: There were two girls behind Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were two girls behind Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I'm sure that made him happy.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You were looking for your owner all along.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...I really wish I'd noticed that.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...Sa-chan.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝To start with... I am not down at all.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...Okay.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke, you remember, don't you?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Actually, I can't figure out what you think I should remember.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm here... just because I felt like I had to be here.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I see.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Perhaps, with their last breath, every creature can create a world like that.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Like the ❛life flashing before your eyes❜ phenomenon.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, maybe.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: Kuro's feelings must have been particularly strong... and I think that's why he was able to make such a mysterious thing happen upon his death.

MESSAGE.Translation: ...and how many of the creators' wishes were fulfilled?

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Rin-chan, I think we should go now.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I said I am not down at all!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I'll see you later, Sa-chan.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Keep it. It's a gift.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: ...Kyousuke walked away.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Well.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝In the end...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝That is not right!! I am here only because you insisted!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ひ、ひはいっふぇ…」

MESSAGE.Translation: ❝Daht shurts...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝She's a new member.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I can only join you when I do not have any softball club activities, but do I hope to get along with you all.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You already brought in a new member, eh, Riki? As expected of the new leader I nominated.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Er, yeah...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You wanna play baseball with us, but aren't gonna quit softball? I'll never let someone half-assed like you be one of us, dummy!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You wanna play baseball with us, but aren't gonna quit softball? I'll never let someone half-assed like you be one of us, dummy!!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Eh? What about me?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No one cares about you.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝What is with your forceful reasoning...?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝The amount of practice will be crazy if I take part in both clubs' activities, will it not?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And remember, we Little Busters only do last-minute practice before a match.❞

MESSAGE.EN: Actually, we would usually just chat and or play around.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝B-But...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝There is no need to worry about that either. The catcher is Riki Naoe, correct?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, yeah.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Then there will be no problem with our teamwork. He and I will make an ideal battery.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝W-Whaat...!?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: Oh my god, she just announced such a shocking thing right in front of everyone...

MESSAGE.Translation: It embarrassed me as much as if she just told everyone what had happened between us.

MESSAGE.Translation: She must have said that without even thinking. If I said that to her, I'm pretty sure she would have blushed and got angry at me.

MESSAGE.EN: I figured the two of us just kind of naturally fit together, like a detective and his assistant.
MESSAGE.Translation: I figured the two of us just kind of naturally fit together, like a detective and his assistant.

MESSAGE.Translation: Even though we had gone through a lot, I've gotten so close to her now, and I'm sure the other members will be able to as well.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「お前は不合格だから却下じゃぼけーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I don't permit you to join us, stupid!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I don't permit you to join us, stupid!!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝This is an interesting development.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...This must be tough on her. The new member stole her brother and her position as the pitcher at the same time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「う、うぅ…」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Uuu...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I welcome her.❞
